 11573 00000B85 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 11574                                  disk_ret:
 11575 00000B89 F8                      		clc
 11576 00000B8A C3                      		retn
 11577                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11578                                  
 11579                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11580                                  
 11581                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11582                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 11583                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 11584                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11585                                  
 11586                                  do_write:
 11587 00000B8B 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 11588 00000B8F 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 11589 00000B91 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11590 00000B95 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 11591                                  do_norm:
 11592 00000B97 E87500                  		call	normspeed
 11593 00000B9A EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 11594                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11595                                  
 11596                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11597                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 11598                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11599                                  
 11600                                  doverify:
 11601 00000B9C 58                      		pop	ax
 11602 00000B9D 50                      		push	ax
 11603 00000B9E B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 11604 00000BA0 E89000                  		call	fastspeed
 11605 00000BA3 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11606                                  
 11607                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11608                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11609                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11610                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 11611                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 11612                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11613                                  
 11614 00000BA5 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11615 00000BA8 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11616 00000BAA FF0E[2305]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11617 00000BAE 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11618 00000BB0 E83305                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11619 00000BB3 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11620                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11621                                  
 11622                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.
 11623 00000BB5 E82E05                  		call	ResetDisk
 11624 00000BB8 FF0E[2105]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11625 00000BBC EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11626                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11627                                  
 11628                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11629                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11630                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11631                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11632                                  
 11633                                  dskerr:
 11634 00000BBE 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 11635 00000BC3 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11636 00000BC5 E8F80C                  		call	checkio
 11637                                  dskerr_nochangeline:
 11638 00000BC8 803E[2505]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11639 00000BCD 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11640 00000BCF BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11641 00000BD2 C606[2505]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11642                                  dochkagain:
 11643 00000BD7 E8A900                  		call	again
 11644                                  dskerr0:
 11645 00000BDA 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11646 00000BDC 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11647                                  					; fnon_removable
 11648 00000BE1 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11649 00000BE3 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11650 00000BE6 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11651                                  skip_timeout_chk:
 11652 00000BE8 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11653 00000BEB 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11654 00000BED C706[2305]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11655                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11656                                  dskerr1:
 11657 00000BF3 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11658                                  		;jmp	retry
 11659                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11660 00000BF4 E900FF                  		jmp	_retry
 11661                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11662                                  
 11663                                  write_fault_err:
 11664 00000BF7 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11665                                  					; for write fault error.
 11666 00000BFA EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11667                                  
 11668                                  		; fall into harderr
 11669                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11670                                  
 11671                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11672                                  
 11673                                  harderr:
 11674 00000BFC E84C00                  		call	maperror
 11675                                  harderr2:
 11676 00000BFF C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11677                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11678 00000C04 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11679 00000C08 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11680                                  
 11681                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11682                                  
 11683                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11684                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11685 00000C0C E919FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11686                                  
 11687                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11688                                  
 11689                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11690                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11691                                  
 11692                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11693                                  normspeed:
 11694 00000C0F 803E[2706]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11695 00000C14 751D                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11696 00000C16 06                      		push	es
 11697 00000C17 50                      		push	ax
 11698 00000C18 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11699 00000C1B C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11700 00000C1F 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11701 00000C23 58                      		pop	ax
 11702 00000C24 07                      		pop	es
 11703 00000C25 E80B00                  		call	fastspeed
 11704                                  		; 24/12/2023
 11705                                  		;push	es
 11706                                  		;les	si, [dpt]
 11707                                  		;mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11708                                  		;			; 1 is fast settle value
 11709                                  		;pop	es
 11710 00000C28 1E                      		push	ds
 11711 00000C29 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11712 00000C2D C6440901                		mov	byte [si+9], 1
 11713 00000C31 1F                      		pop	ds
 11714                                  
 11715 00000C32 C3                      		retn
 11716                                  
 11717                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11718                                  
 11719                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11720                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11721                                  
 11722                                  fastspeed:
 11723 00000C33 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11724                                  					; ftoobig
 11725 00000C38 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11726 00000C3A 06                      		push	es
 11727 00000C3B 8E06[2605]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11728 00000C3F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11729 00000C41 8C06[2605]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11730 00000C45 07                      		pop	es
 11731 00000C46 C3                      		retn
 11732                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11733                                  
 11734                                  notready:
 11735 00000C47 F9                      		stc
 11736 00000C48 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11737 00000C4A C3                      		retn
 11738                                  
 11739                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11740                                  
 11741                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11742                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11743                                  
 11744                                  maperror:
 11745 00000C4B 51                      		push	cx
 11746 00000C4C 06                      		push	es
 11747 00000C4D 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11748 00000C4E 07                      		pop	es
 11749 00000C4F 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11750 00000C51 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11751                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 11752 00000C54 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11753                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11754 00000C57 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11755 00000C5A F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11756                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11757                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 11758                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11759 00000C5C 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11760                                  					; get translation
 11761                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11762                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11763 00000C5F 07                      		pop	es
 11764 00000C60 59                      		pop	cx
 11765 00000C61 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11766 00000C62 C3                      		retn
 11767                                  
 11768                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11769                                  
 11770                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11771                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11772                                  
 11773                                  set_tim:
 11774 00000C63 50                      		push	ax
 11775 00000C64 E8B4F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11776                                  
 11777                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11778                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11779                                  
 11780 00000C67 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11781 00000C6B 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11782 00000C6D 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11783                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11784                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11785 00000C71 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11786                                  setaccess:
 11787 00000C73 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11788 00000C78 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11789 00000C7C 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11790                                  done_set:
 11791 00000C80 F8                      		clc
 11792                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11793 00000C81 58                      		pop	ax
 11794 00000C82 C3                      		retn
 11795                                  
 11796                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11797                                  
 11798                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11799                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11800                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11801                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11802                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11803                                  
 11804                                  again:	
 11805 00000C83 E86004                  		call	ResetDisk
 11806 00000C86 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11807 00000C89 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11808                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11809 00000C8B 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11810 00000C8C C3                      		retn
 11811                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11812                                  
 11813                                  dont_dec_retry_count:
 11814 00000C8D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11815 00000C8F C3                      		retn

 11830                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11831                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11832                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11833                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed

 11837                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 11921                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11922                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11923                                  ;
 11924                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11925                                  ;
 11926                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11927                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11928                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11929                                  ;
 11930                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11931                                  
 11932                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11933                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11934                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11935 00000CC0 E8A7F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11936 00000CC3 06                      		push	es
 11937 00000CC4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11938 00000CC8 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11939                                  					; RAWIO
 11940 00000CCD 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11941 00000CD1 07                      		pop	es
 11942 00000CD2 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11943                                  
 11944                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11945                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11946                                  
 11947                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11948 00000CD4 BE[910C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11949                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11950                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11951 00000CD7 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11952 00000CD9 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11953                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11954 00000CDB BE[A40C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11955                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11956                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11957                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11958 00000CDE 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11959 00000CE0 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11960 00000CE2 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11961 00000CE5 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11962 00000CE7 98                      		cbw
 11963 00000CE8 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11964 00000CEA 46                      		inc	si
 11965 00000CEB 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11966 00000CED 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11967                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11968 00000CF0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11969                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11970                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11971 00000CF5 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11972 00000CF7 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11973                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11974                                  
 11975                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11976                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11977                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11978 00000CF8 5A                      		pop	dx
 11979                                  
 11980                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11981 00000CF9 E9D9F3                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

 11983

 11986                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11987                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11988                                  ;
 11989                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11990                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11991                                  ;
 11992                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11993                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11994                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11995                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11996                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11997                                  
 11998                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11999                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 12000                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 12001                                  
 12002 00000CFC C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12003 00000D00 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12004                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 12005 00000D03 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12006 00000D07 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 12007 00000D0A 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12008 00000D0E 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 12009                                  					; Mask off other bits
 12010 00000D11 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 12011 00000D14 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12012 00000D18 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 12013 00000D1B 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 12014 00000D1D 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]

 12219                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12220                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12221                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12222                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12223                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12224                                  ;
 12225                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12226                                  ;
 12227                                  ; output:
 12228                                  ;	for status call:
 12229                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12230                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12231                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12232                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12233                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12234                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12235                                  ;
 12236                                  ;	for format track:
 12237                                  ;		carry set if error
 12238                                  ;
 12239                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12240                                  
 12241                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12242

 12393                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12394                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12395                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12396                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12397                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12398                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12399                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be

 12403                                  		; register.

 12506                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

 12508                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12509                                  
 12510                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12511                                  ;
 12512                                  ; TrackIo:
 12513                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12514                                  ;
 12515                                  ;   input:
 12516                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12517                                  ;		  3 = write
 12518                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12519                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12520                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12521                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12522                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12523                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12524                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12525                                  ;
 12526                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12527                                  
 12528                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12529                                  		
 12530                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12531                                  TrackIo:	
 12532                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12533 00000F72 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error

 12538 00000F80 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o

 12541 00000F85 59                      		pop	cx
 12542 00000F86 58                      		pop	ax

 12549                                  		; WE WANT:

 12551                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12552

 12691                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12692                                  SetDasd:

 12759                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12760                                  DasdHasBeenSet:

 12765                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12766                                  
 12767                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12768                                  
 12769                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12770                                  ;
 12771                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12772                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12773                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12774                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12775                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12776                                  ;
 12777                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12778                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12779                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12780                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12781                                  ;
 12782                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12783                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12784                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12785                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12786                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12787                                  ;
 12788                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12789                                  
 12790                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12791                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12792 00001052 51                      		push	cx
 12793 00001053 52                      		push	dx
 12794                                  
 12795                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12796                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12797                                  
 12798 00001054 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12799 00001059 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12800 0000105B 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12801 0000105D 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12802 00001062 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12803 00001064 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12804                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12805                                  
 12806                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12807 00001066 06                      		push	es
 12808 00001067 56                      		push	si
 12809                                  		
 12810                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12811                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12812 00001068 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12813 0000106A 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12814                                  
 12815 0000106C 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12816                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12817                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12818 00001071 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12819 00001075 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12820                                  
 12821                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12822                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12823                                  
 12824 00001079 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12825 0000107E 5E                      		pop	si
 12826 0000107F 07                      		pop	es
 12827                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 12828 00001080 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12829 00001084 49                      		dec	cx
 12830 00001085 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12831 00001088 D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12832 0000108A D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12833 0000108C 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12834 0000108E 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]

 12840 0000109A B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12841 0000109C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12842                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12843 0000109E 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12844 000010A0 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12845 000010A5 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12846 000010A7 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12847                                  
 12848                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12849                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12850 000010A8 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12851 000010AA 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12852 000010AC 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12853                                  
 12854 000010AD 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12855                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12856                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12857 000010B2 8936[2906]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12858 000010B6 8C06[2B06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12859                                  
 12860                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12861                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12862                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12863                                  		;mov	es, si
 12864 000010BA 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12865                                  
 12866                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di

 12868                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12869 000010C0 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]

 12929                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE

 12931                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12932                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12933                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next

 12965                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12969                                  ;

 12971                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf

 12976                                  ;
 12977                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12978                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13

 13039                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 13041                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13042                                  
 13043                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13044                                  ;
 13045                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13046                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13047                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13048                                  ;
 13049                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13050                                  
 13051                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13052                                  ioctl_getown:
 13053 00001152 E815F4                  		call	SetDrive
 13054 00001155 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13055                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13056 00001159 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13057                                  ownloop:				
 13058 0000115D 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13059 00001161 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13060                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13061 00001163 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13062                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13063                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13064 00001168 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13065                                  getnextBDS:				
 13066 0000116A 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13067 0000116D EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13068                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13069                                  
 13070                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13071                                  ;
 13072                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13073                                  ; in al to al.
 13074                                  ;
 13075                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13076                                  
 13077                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13078                                  ioctl_setown:
 13079 0000116F E8F8F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13080 00001172 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13081                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13082 00001177 E84FF7                  		call	checksingle
 13083                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13084 0000117A FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13085                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13086                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13087                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13088                                  
 13089                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13090                                  ;
 13091                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13092                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13093                                  ;
 13094                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13095                                  
 13096                                  exitown:				
 13097 0000117E 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 13098                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13099 00001180 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h

 13101                                  					; fi_am_mult

 13105                                  					; Get it 1-based
 13106 0000118B FEC1                    		inc	cl
 13107                                  exitnomult:

 13109 00001191 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 13110                                  					; Exit normal termination
 13111                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13112                                  		; cf=0
 13113                                  		;clc
 13114 00001194 C3                      		retn

 13172                                  
 13173                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13174                                  ;	get media id
 13175                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13176                                  ;
 13177                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13178                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13179                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13180                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13181                                  ;
 13182                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13183                                  ;
 13184                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13185                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13186                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13187                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13188                                  ;
 13189                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13190                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13191                                  ;
 13192                                  ; LOGIC:
 13193                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13194                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13195                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13196                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13197                                  ;
 13198                                  ; {
 13199                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13200                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13201                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13202                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13203                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13204                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13205                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13206                                  ;		};
 13207                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13208                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13209                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13210                                  ;		};
 13211                                  ;	else
 13212                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13213                                  ;
 13214                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13215                                  
 13216                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13217                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13218                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13219                                  
 13220                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13221                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13222                                  GetMediaId:
 13223 000011BD E89900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13224 000011C0 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13225 000011C4 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13226 000011C9 E87500                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13227 000011CC 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13228                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13229 000011CE 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13230                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13231                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13232                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13233 000011D3 721B                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	
 13234                                  
 13235                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13236 000011D5 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13237 000011D8 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13238                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13239                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13240 000011DB 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13241 000011DD C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13242 000011E1 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13243                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13244 000011E5 46                      		inc	si
 13245                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13246                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13247 000011E6 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13248                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 13249 000011E9 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13250                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13251                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13252 000011EC F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13253                                  	
 13254                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13255                                  		; cf = 0
 13256                                  		;clc
 13257                                  
 13258 000011EE C3                      		retn
 13259                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13260                                  
 13261                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13262                                  IOCtl_If2:
 13263 000011EF F9                      		stc	
 13264                                  IOCtl_If7:
 13265 000011F0 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13266                                  		;stc
 13267                                  IOCtl_If6:
 13268                                  IOCtl_If1:
 13269 000011F2 C3                      		retn
 13270                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13271                                  
 13272                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13273                                  
 13274                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13275                                  ;  set media id
 13276                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13277                                  
 13278                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13279                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13280                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13281                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13282                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13283                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13284                                  ;
 13285                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13286                                  ;
 13287                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13288                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13289                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13290                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13291                                  ;
 13292                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13293                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13294                                  ;
 13295                                  ; logic:
 13296                                  ;
 13297                                  ; {
 13298                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13299                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13300                                  ;	BootIo;
 13301                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13302                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13303                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13304                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13305                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13306                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13307                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13308                                  ;		};
 13309                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13310                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13311                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13312                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13313                                  ;		};
 13314                                  ;	else
 13315                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13316                                  ;
 13317                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13318                                  
 13319                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13320                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13321                                  SetMediaId:
 13322 000011F3 E86300                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13323 000011F6 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13324                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13325 000011FA 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13326 000011FC C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13327 00001201 52                      		push	dx
 13328 00001202 E83C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13329 00001205 5A                      		pop	dx
 13330 00001206 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13331                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13332 00001208 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13333                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13334 0000120D 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13335                                  		
 13336 0000120F 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13337                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13338                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13339                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13340 00001214 75D9                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2
 13341                                  
 13342 00001216 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13343 00001217 57                      		push	di
 13344 00001218 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13345 00001219 07                      		pop	es
 13346 0000121A BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13347 0000121D C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13348 00001221 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13349 00001224 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13350                                  
 13351                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13352                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13353                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13354                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13355                                  		;rep movsb
 13356 00001227 E8BFFF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 13357                                  
 13358 0000122A 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13359 0000122B 1F                      		pop	ds
 13360 0000122C 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13361 0000122D 07                      		pop	es
 13362 0000122E E894F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13363 00001231 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13364 00001233 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13365 00001238 E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13366 0000123B C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13367                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13368                                  					; return with error code from BootIo

 13381                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13382                                  
 13383                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13384                                  ;	BootIo
 13385                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13386                                  ;
 13387                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13388                                  ;
 13389                                  ; input :
 13390                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13391                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13392                                  ;
 13393                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13394                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13395                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13396                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13397                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13398                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13399                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13400                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13401                                  ;
 13402                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13403                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13404                                  ;
 13405                                  ; logic:
 13406                                  ;
 13407                                  ; {
 13408                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13409                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13410                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13411                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13412                                  ; }
 13413                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13414                                  
 13415                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13416                                  BootIo:	
 13417 00001241 06                      		push	es
 13418 00001242 57                      		push	di
 13419 00001243 53                      		push	bx
 13420 00001244 1E                      		push	ds
 13421 00001245 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13422                                  
 13423                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13424                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13425                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13426                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13427                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13428                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13429                                  
 13430 00001246 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13431 00001249 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13432 0000124B 8916[1C05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13433 0000124F B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13434 00001252 E8FEF6                  		call	diskio
 13435 00001255 5B                      		pop	bx
 13436 00001256 5F                      		pop	di
 13437 00001257 07                      		pop	es
 13438 00001258 C3                      		retn
 13439                                  
 13440                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13441                                  
 13442                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13443                                  
 13444                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13445                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13446                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13447                                  ;
 13448                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13449                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13450                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13451                                  ; history in the flags.
 13452                                  ;
 13453                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13454                                  ;
 13455                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13456                                  ;
 13457                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13458                                  ;
 13459                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13460                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13461                                  ;
 13462                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13463                                  
 13464                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13465 00001259 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13466 0000125D 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13467 0000125F 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13468                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13469 00001261 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13470                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13471                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13472 00001266 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13473 00001268 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13474 0000126D 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13475 0000126F E8EA06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13476 00001272 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13477                                  
 13478                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13479                                  
 13480 00001274 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13481 00001276 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13482                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13483                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13484 00001278 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13485 0000127A 53                      		push	bx
 13486 0000127B BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13487                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13488                                  					; physical drive
 13489 0000127E E8B406                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13490 00001281 5B                      		pop	bx
 13491                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13492 00001282 C3                      		retn
 13493                                  
 13494                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13495                                  
 13496                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13497                                  
 13498                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13499                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13500                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13501                                  ;
 13502                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13503                                  ;
 13504                                  ; INPUT :
 13505                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13506                                  ;
 13507                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13508                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13509                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13510                                  
 13511                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13512                                  GetAccessFlag:
 13513 00001283 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13514 00001287 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13515                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13516                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13517 0000128A 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13518                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13519 0000128C 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13520                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13521                                  					; unformatted_media
 13522 00001291 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13523                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13524                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13525 00001293 40                      		inc	ax
 13526                                  GafDone:
 13527 00001294 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13528 00001297 C3                      		retn
 13529                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13530                                  
 13531                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13532                                  
 13533                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13534                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13535                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13536                                  ;
 13537                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13538                                  ;
 13539                                  ; input :
 13540                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13541                                  ;
 13542                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13543                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13544                                  
 13545                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13546                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13547 00001298 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13548 0000129C C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13549                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13550 0000129F 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13551                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13552                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13553 000012A4 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13554 000012A8 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13555                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13556 000012AA 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13557                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13558                                  					; unformatted_media
 13559                                  saf_Done:				
 13560 000012AF C3                      		retn

 13565                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13566                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13567                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13568                                  ;
 13569                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13570                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13571                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13572                                  ;
 13573                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13574                                  
 13575                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13576                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13577 000012B0 06                      		push	es
 13578 000012B1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13579 000012B5 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13580                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13581                                  
 13582                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13583                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 13584                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 13585                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 13586                                  
 13587 000012B9 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13588                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13589 000012BB 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13590                                  ioctl_support:
 13591 000012BD 0E                      		push	cs
 13592 000012BE 07                      		pop	es
 13593                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13594                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13595 000012BF B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13596                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13597 000012C2 BF[B50C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13598                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13599                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13600 000012C5 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13601 000012C7 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13602 000012C9 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13603 000012CB B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13604                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13605                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13606                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13607                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13608                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13609                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13610                                  ioctlsupexit:
 13611 000012CE 07                      		pop	es
 13612                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13613                                  		; cf = 0
 13614                                  		;clc
 13615 000012CF C3                      		retn
 13616                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13617                                  nosupport:
 13618 000012D0 07                      		pop	es
 13619 000012D1 E901EE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
