 15063 000017C2 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 15064 000017C4 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 15064 000017CD 736B6574746520666F-
 15064 000017D6 7220647269766520   
 15065                                  
 15066                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 15067 000017DE 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 15067 000017E7 65737320616E79206B-
 15067 000017F0 6579207768656E2072-
 15067 000017F9 656164790D0A       
 15068 000017FF 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 15069                                  
 15070                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15071                                  
 15072                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15073                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15074                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15075                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15076                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15077                                  
 15078                                  chkopcnt:		
 15079 00001801 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15080 00001806 C3                      		retn
 15081                                  
 15082                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15083                                  
 15084                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15085                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15086                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15087                                  ;
 15088                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15089                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15090                                  
 15091                                  mediacheck:	
 15092 00001807 E8BFF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15093 0000180A 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15094 0000180C E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15095 0000180F 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15096 00001811 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15097 00001814 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15098 00001816 50                      		push	ax
 15099 00001817 52                      		push	dx
 15100 00001818 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15101                                  					; set logical drive number
 15102 0000181C B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15103 0000181E CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15104                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15105                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15106 00001820 5A                      		pop	dx
 15107 00001821 58                      		pop	ax
 15108 00001822 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15109 00001824 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15110                                  
 15111                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15112                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15113                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15114                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15115                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15116                                  ; status.
 15117                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15118 00001827 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15119 0000182B 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15120                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15121                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15122                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15123                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15124 0000182F 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15125                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15126                                  
 15127                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15128                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15129                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15130                                  
 15131 00001831 50                      		push	ax
 15132 00001832 51                      		push	cx
 15133 00001833 52                      		push	dx
 15134 00001834 E8B9ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15135 00001837 5A                      		pop	dx
 15136 00001838 59                      		pop	cx
 15137 00001839 58                      		pop	ax
 15138 0000183A 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15139 0000183C 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15140                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15141 0000183E 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15142                                  mediaret:				
 15143 00001840 C3                      		retn
 15144                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15145                                  
 15146                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15147                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15148                                  ; or write.
 15149                                  
 15150                                  mediadovolid:				
 15151 00001841 E84CEE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15152 00001844 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15153 00001846 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15154 00001849 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15155 0000184B E9FDF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15156                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15157                                  
 15158                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15159                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15160                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15161                                  ; dos.
 15162                                  ;
 15163                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15164                                  
 15165                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15166                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15167                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15168                                  
 15169                                  checklatchio:	
 15170                                  
 15171                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15172                                  			
 15173 0000184E E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15174 00001851 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15175                                  
 15176                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15177                                  
 15178 00001853 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15179 00001856 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15180                                  
 15181                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15182                                  ; expensive verification.
 15183                                  
 15184 00001858 E835EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15185 0000185B 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15186 0000185D E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15187 00001860 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15188 00001862 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15189 00001864 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15190 00001866 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15191                                  checklatchret:				
 15192 00001869 E8DFF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15193                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15194 0000186C F9                      		stc
 15195 0000186D 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15196                                  checkret:				
 15197 0000186E C3                      		retn
 15198                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15199                                  
 15200                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15201                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15202                                  ;
 15203                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15204                                  
 15205                                  checkfatvid:				
 15206 0000186F E8BC01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15207 00001872 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15208 00001874 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15209                                  
 15210                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15211                                  
 15212                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15213                                  
 15214                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15215                                  
 15216                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15217                                  ;
 15218                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15219                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15220                                  ;
 15221                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15222                                  ;
 15223                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15224                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15225                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15226                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15227                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15228                                  ;
 15229                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15230                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15231                                  ; routine.)
 15232                                  ;
 15233                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15234                                  
 15235                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15236                                  check_vid:
 15237                                  
 15238                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15239                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15240                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15241                                  
 15242 00001876 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15243                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15244                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15245 0000187B 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15246 0000187D E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15247 00001880 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15248 00001882 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15249 00001884 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15250                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15251 00001889 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15252                                  					; if not fat system
 15253 0000188B E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15254 0000188E 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15255 00001890 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15256 00001893 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15257                                  					; definitely changed
 15258 00001896 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15259                                  
 15260 00001898 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15261                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15262 00001899 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15263                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15264                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15265                                  		;clc
 15266                                  checkfatret:				
 15267 0000189C C3                      		retn
 15268                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15269                                  
 15270                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15271                                  changed_drv:
 15272 0000189D F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15273 0000189E C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15274                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15275 000018A3 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15276                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15277                                  
 15278                                  ; extended id check
 15279                                  
 15280                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15281                                  
 15282                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15283                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15284                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15285                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15286                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15287                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15288                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15289                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15290                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15291                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15292                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15293                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15294                                  ;
 15295                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15296                                  
 15297                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15298                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15299 000018A4 50                      		push	ax
 15300                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15301                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15302 000018A5 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15303                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15304 000018A8 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15305 000018AA 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15306 000018AE 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15307 000018B0 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15308 000018B3 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15309 000018B7 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15310                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15311                                  					; don't know
 15312 000018B9 58                      		pop	ax
 15313 000018BA EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15314                                  					; reset the flag
 15315                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15316                                  
 15317                                  ext_changed:
 15318 000018BC 58                      		pop	ax
 15319                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15320 000018BD 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15321                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15322                                  					; disk changed!
 15323                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15324                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15325                                  		;clc
 15326 000018BE EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15327                                  
 15328                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15329                                  
 15330                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15331                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15332                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15333                                  ;
 15334                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15335                                  
 15336                                  checkio:				
 15337 000018C0 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15338 000018C3 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15339 000018C5 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15340 000018C8 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15341 000018CA E8C3ED                  		call	GetBp
 15342 000018CD 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15343 000018CF E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15344 000018D2 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15345 000018D4 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15346 000018D6 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15347 000018D8 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15348 000018D9 C3                      		retn
 15349                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15350                                  
 15351                                  checkioerr:				
 15352 000018DA E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15353                                  
 15354                                  checkioret:				
 15355 000018DD F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15356 000018DE E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr
 15357                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15358                                  
 15359                                  no_error_map:				
 15360 000018E1 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15361                                  
 15362                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15363                                  
 15364                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15365                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15366                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15367                                  
 15368                                  returnvid:		
 15369 000018E4 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15370                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15371 000018E7 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15372 000018EA B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15373 000018EC F9                      		stc
 15374 000018ED C3                      		retn
 15375                                  
 15376                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15377                                  
 15378                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15379                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15380                                  ;
 15381                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15382                                  ; **trashes si**
 15383                                  
 15384                                  media_set_vid:				
 15385 000018EE BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15386                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15387                                  
 15388                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15389                                  
 15390                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15391                                  
 15392                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15393                                  
 15394                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15395                                  vid_into_packet:
 15396 000018F1 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15397 000018F2 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15398 000018F6 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15399 000018F9 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15400 000018FB 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15401 000018FE 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15402 00001901 1F                      		pop	ds
 15403                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15404 00001902 C3                      		retn
 15405                                  
 15406                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15407                                  
 15408                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15409                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15410                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15411                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15412                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15413                                  ;
 15414                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15415                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15416                                  ;
 15417                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15418                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15419                                  ;		carry set
 15420                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15421                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15422                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15423                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15424                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15425                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15426                                  ;
 15427                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15428                                  
 15429                                  hidensity:
 15430                                  
 15431                                  ; check for correct drive
 15432                                  		
 15433                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15434 00001903 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15435                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15436                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15437 00001908 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15438                                  
 15439                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15440                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15441                                  
 15442 0000190A 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15443 0000190F 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15444                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15445                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15446 00001911 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15447 00001914 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15448                                  
 15449                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15450                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15451                                  
 15452                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15453 00001916 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15454 0000191A 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15455                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15456                                  					; ffOther
 15457 0000191C 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15458 0000191E 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15459                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15460                                  					; ff288
 15461 00001920 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15462 00001922 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15463 00001924 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15464                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15465                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15466 00001927 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15467                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15468                                  					; 2 sides
 15469                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15470 0000192A 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15471 0000192B BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15472                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15473                                  					; & head max
 15474                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15475 0000192E E9C8ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15476                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15477                                  
 15478                                  Is720K:
 15479                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15480 00001931 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15481                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15482 00001932 E991ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15483                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15484                                  
 15485                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15486                                  ;dofloppy:
 15487                                  		;retn
 15488                                  
 15489                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15490                                  
 15491                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15492                                  
 15493                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15494                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15495                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15496                                  ;
 15497                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15498                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15499                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15500                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15501                                  ;
 15502                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15503                                  ;
 15504                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15505                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15506                                  
 15507                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15508 00001935 06                      		push	es
 15509 00001936 57                      		push	di
 15510                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15511                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15512 00001937 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15513                                  
 15514                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15515                                  
 15516                                  scan_bds:				
 15517 0000193B 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15518 0000193F 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15519                                  
 15520                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15521                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15522                                  
 15523 00001941 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15524                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15525                                  get_next_bds:				
 15526 00001945 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15527                                  					; go to	next bds
 15528 00001948 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15529 0000194B 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15530 0000194D 5F                      		pop	di
 15531 0000194E 07                      		pop	es
 15532 0000194F C3                      		retn
 15533                                  
 15534                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15535                                  
 15536                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15537                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15538                                  ;
 15539                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15540                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15541                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15542                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15543                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15544                                  
 15545                                  checkromchange:	
 15546                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15547                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15548 00001950 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15549                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15550                                  					; fchanged
 15551 00001955 C3                      		retn
 15552                                  
 15553                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15554                                  
 15555                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15556                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15557                                  ;
 15558                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15559                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15560                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15561                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15562                                  
 15563                                  resetchanged:	
 15564                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15565                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15566 00001956 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15567                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15568                                  					; ~fchanged
 15569 0000195B C3                      		retn
 15570                                  
 15571                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15572                                  
 15573                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15574                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15575                                  ;
 15576                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15577                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15578                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15579                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15580                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15581                                  
 15582                                  haschange:
 15583                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15584                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15585 0000195C 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15586                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15587                                  					; fchangeline
 15588 00001961 C3                      		retn
 15589                                  
 15590                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15591                                  
 15592                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15593                                  
 15594                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15595                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15596                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15597                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15598                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15599                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15600                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15601                                  
 15602                                  ; set_volume_id
 15603                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15604                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15605                                  ;
 15606                                  ;   on entry:
 15607                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15608                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15609                                  ;
 15610                                  ;   on exit:
 15611                                  ;	carry clear:
 15612                                  ;	   successful call
 15613                                  ;	carry set
 15614                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15615                                  
 15616                                  set_volume_id:				
 15617 00001962 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15618 00001963 50                      		push	ax
 15619 00001964 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15620 00001967 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15621 00001969 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15622 0000196C 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15623 0000196E E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15624 00001971 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15625                                  setvret:				
 15626                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15627                                  		; cf = 0
 15628                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15629 00001974 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15630 00001975 5A                      		pop	dx
 15631 00001976 C3                      		retn
 15632                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15633                                  
 15634                                  seterr:					
 15635 00001977 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15636 00001978 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15637 00001979 C3                      		retn
 15638                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15639 0000197A 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15640                                  
 15641                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15642                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15643                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15644                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15645                                  
 15646                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15647                                  
 15648                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15649                                  
 15650                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15651                                  ;
 15652                                  ;   on entry:
 15653                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15654                                  ;
 15655                                  ;   on exit:
 15656                                  ;	carry clear
 15657                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15658                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15659                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15660                                  ;
 15661                                  ;	carry set:
 15662                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15663                                  
 15664                                  read_volume_id:
 15665 0000197C 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15666 0000197D 51                      		push	cx
 15667 0000197E 53                      		push	bx
 15668 0000197F 50                      		push	ax
 15669 00001980 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15670 00001981 57                      		push	di
 15671 00001982 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15672 00001983 07                      		pop	es
 15673 00001984 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15674 00001987 BE[9508]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15675                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15676 0000198A B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15677 0000198D F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15678 0000198F 5F                      		pop	di
 15679 00001990 07                      		pop	es
 15680 00001991 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15681                                  					; # of fats
 15682 00001995 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15683                                  					; sectors / fat
 15684 00001999 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15685 0000199B 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15686                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15687                                  					;
 15688                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15689                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15690 0000199F 2EA3[7A19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15691                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15692                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15693 000019A3 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15694                                  					; # root dir entries
 15695 000019A7 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15696 000019A9 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15697                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15698                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15699 000019AB 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15700                                  next_sec:
 15701 000019AC 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15702 000019AD 2EA1[7A19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15703                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15704                                  					; get sector #
 15705 000019B1 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15706                                  					; sectors / track
 15707 000019B5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15708 000019B7 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15709                                  
 15710                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15711                                  
 15712 000019B9 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15713                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15714 000019BA 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15715 000019BC 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15716 000019BE 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15717                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15718 000019C2 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15719 000019C4 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15720 000019C6 E83EEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15721                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15722 000019C9 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15723 000019CB B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15724 000019CE B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15725                                  fvid_loop:
 15726                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15727 000019D0 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15728                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15729 000019D2 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15730 000019D4 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15731 000019D7 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15732 000019D9 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15733 000019DC 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15734                                  ent_loop:
 15735 000019DE 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15736 000019E1 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15737 000019E3 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15738 000019E4 2EFF06[7A19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15739                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15740                                  					; next sector
 15741 000019E9 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15742                                  notfound:
 15743                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15744                                  		;xor	si, si
 15745 000019EB EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15746                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15747                                  
 15748                                  found_vid:
 15749                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15750                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15751 000019ED 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15752 000019EE 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15753 000019F0 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15754 000019F1 57                      		push	di
 15755 000019F2 1E                      		push	ds
 15756 000019F3 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15757 000019F4 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15758 000019F7 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15759                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15760 000019FA F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15761                                  		;xor	al, al
 15762                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15763 000019FC 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15764 000019FD AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15765                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15766                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15767                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15768 000019FE 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15769 000019FF 07                      		pop	es
 15770                                  fvid_ret:
 15771                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15772 00001A00 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15773                                  				
 15774 00001A02 58                      		pop	ax
 15775                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15776                                  		; cf = 0
 15777                                  		;clc
 15778                                  rvidret:
 15779 00001A03 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15780 00001A04 59                      		pop	cx
 15781 00001A05 5A                      		pop	dx
 15782 00001A06 C3                      		retn
 15783                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15784                                  
 15785                                  no_vid:
 15786 00001A07 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15787                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15788                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15789 00001A08 EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15790                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15791                                  
 15792                                  readviderr:
 15793 00001A0A 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15794 00001A0B 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15795 00001A0C EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15796                                  
 15797                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15798                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15799                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15800                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15801 00001A0E BE[A108]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15802                                  		;
 15803                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15804                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15805                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15806                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15807 00001A11 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15808 00001A14 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15809                                  		;
 15810 00001A17 FC                      		cld
 15811 00001A18 C3                      		retn
 15812                                  
 15813                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15814                                  
 15815                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15816                                  ;
 15817                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15818                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15819                                  
 15820                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15821 00001A19 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15822                                  		;push	si
 15823 00001A1A 51                      		push	cx
 15824                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15825 00001A1B 56                      		push	si
 15826                                  
 15827                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15828                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15829                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15830                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15831                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15832                                  		;cld
 15833                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15834 00001A1C E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15835                                  
 15836 00001A1F F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15837                                  		
 15838                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15839 00001A21 5E                      		pop	si
 15840                                  chk_volid_ok:
 15841 00001A22 59                      		pop	cx
 15842                                  		;pop	si
 15843 00001A23 5F                      		pop	di
 15844 00001A24 C3                      		retn
 15845                                  
 15846                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15847                                  
 15848                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15849                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15850                                  ;
 15851                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15852                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15853                                  
 15854                                  check_volume_id:
 15855 00001A25 57                      		push	di
 15856 00001A26 51                      		push	cx
 15857                                  		
 15858                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15859                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15860                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15861                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15862                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15863                                  		;cld
 15864                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15865 00001A27 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15866                                  
 15867 00001A2A F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15868                                  		
 15869                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15870                                  		;pop	cx
 15871                                  		;pop	di
 15872                                  		;retn
 15873 00001A2C EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok
 15874                                  
 15875                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15876                                  
 15877                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15878                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15879                                  ;
 15880                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15881                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15882                                  ;
 15883                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15884                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15885                                  ;
 15886                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15887                                  
 15888                                  fat_check:
 15889 00001A2E 50                      		push	ax
 15890 00001A2F 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15891 00001A31 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15892 00001A34 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15893                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15894 00001A38 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15895 00001A3A 4E                      		dec	si
 15896                                  okret1:
 15897 00001A3B 58                      		pop	ax
 15898 00001A3C C3                      		retn
 15899                                  
 15900                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15901                                  
 15902                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS) ((& MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS)) ; 27/12/2023
 15903                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15904                                  
 15905                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15906                                  
 15907                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15908                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15909                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15910                                  
 15911                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15912                                  
 15913                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15914                                  		;db 0
 15915                                  
 15916                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15917                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15918                                  
 15919                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15920 00001A3D 00<rep 3h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15921                                  %endif
 15922                                  
 15923                                  ;align 16
 15924

 15926                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15927                                  ; 29/09/2023
