 31428                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31429                                  ;*** toDigit - converts a character-digit to its binary counterpart
 31430                                  ;            -- verifies that CL contains a valid character-digit; if so, it
 31431                                  ; changes CL to its counterpart binary digit ((CL-'0') or (CL-'A'+10)).
 31432                                  ; A-F are considered valid if gnradix is 16.
 31433                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31434                                  ; ENTRY:    CL contains a digit ('0' to '9' or, if gnradix==16, 'A' to 'F')
 31435                                  ; EXIT:     CL contains digit in binary (0 to 9 or, if gnradix==16, 0 to 15)
 31436                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set indicates invalid digit; carry clear indicates good digit
 31437                                  ; USES:     CL, Flags
 31438                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31439                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 31440                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 31441                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 31442                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31443                                  
 31444                                  gnradix:
 31445 00002B69 0000                    	dw	0		; Must be a word--16x16 multiplication
 31446                                  
 31447                                  toDigit:
 31448 00002B6B 2E833E[692B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 31449 00002B71 751C                    	jne	short td20	; Don't check hex digits if radix isn't 16
 31450                                  
 31451                                  toDigit_hex:
 31452 00002B73 80F961                  	cmp	cl,'a'	; 61h
 31453 00002B76 7209                    	jb	short td10
 31454 00002B78 80F966                  	cmp	cl,'f'	; 66h
 31455 00002B7B 7720                    	ja	short tdE	; Nothing valid above 'f' at all...
 31456 00002B7D 80E957                  	sub	cl,'a'-10 ; 57h	; Make 'a'==10 and return.
 31457                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 31458 00002B80 C3                      	retn
 31459                                  td10:	
 31460 00002B81 80F941                  	cmp	cl,'A'  ; 41h
 31461 00002B84 7209                    	jb	short td20	; Below 'A'? Not a letter...
 31462 00002B86 80F946                  	cmp	cl,'F'	; 46h
 31463 00002B89 7712                    	ja	short tdE	; Above 'F'? Not a digit.
 31464 00002B8B 80E937                  	sub	cl,'A'-10 ; 37h	; Make 'A'==10 and return.
 31465                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 31466 00002B8E C3                      	retn
 31467                                  toDigit_dec:
 31468                                  td20:	
 31469 00002B8F 80F930                  	cmp	cl,'0'		; If less than zero,
 31470                                  	;jb	short tdE	; Done.
 31471 00002B92 720A                    	jb	short tdEr ; 08/04/2019
 31472 00002B94 80F939                  	cmp	cl,'9'		; Or, if greater than nine,
 31473 00002B97 7704                    	ja	short tdE	; Done.
 31474 00002B99 80E930                  	sub	cl,'0'	; 30h	; Okay--make '0'==0 and return.
 31475                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 31476 00002B9C C3                      	retn
 31477                                  tdE:	
 31478 00002B9D F9                      	stc
 31479                                  tdEr:		; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 31480 00002B9E C3                      	retn
 31481                                  
 31482                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31483                                  ;*** GetXNum - reads a 32-bit ASCII number at ES:SI and returns it in DX:AX
 31484                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31485                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:SI points to an ascii string to scan
 31486                                  ; EXIT:     ES:SI moved to first invalid digit, DX:AX contains value read
 31487                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if # is too big, or has no digits (EOL possibly)
 31488                                  ; USES:     ES:SI, DX, AX, Flags, gnradix
 31489                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31490                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 31491                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 31492                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 31493                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31494                                  
 31495                                  ; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31496                                  
 31497                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31498                                  ; (SYSINIT:3109h)
 31499                                  
 31500                                  GetXNum:
 31501                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, ds>
 31502                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31503                                  	;push	bx
 31504 00002B9F 51                      	push	cx ; *
 31505                                  	;push	ds
 31506                                  
 31507 00002BA0 FC                      	cld
 31508 00002BA1 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31509 00002BA3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 31510 00002BA5 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31511 00002BA7 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			; Start with 0 (makes sense)
 31512                                  
 31513 00002BA9 2EC706[692B]0A00        	mov	word [cs:gnradix],10	; And default to a radix of 10 (dec)
 31514                                  
 31515 00002BB0 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]		; Now AX=0, BX=0, CH=0/CL=char, DX=0
 31516                                  	;call	toDigit
 31517 00002BB3 E8D9FF                  	call	toDigit_dec
 31518                                  	;jc	short gxnE		; If it's not a digit, leave now.
 31519                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31520 00002BB6 7233                    	jc	short gxnX
 31521                                  
 31522 00002BB8 08C9                    	or	cl,cl
 31523 00002BBA 7517                    	jnz	short gxn20		; Doesn't have '0x'
 31524 00002BBC 268A4C01                	mov	cl,[es:si+1]
 31525 00002BC0 80F978                  	cmp	cl,'x'			; Either 'x'...
 31526 00002BC3 7405                    	je	short gxn10
 31527 00002BC5 80F958                  	cmp	cl,'X'			; ...or 'X' means it's hexadecimal
 31528 00002BC8 7509                    	jne	short gxn20
 31529                                  
 31530                                  gxn10:	
 31531 00002BCA 2EC706[692B]1000        	mov	word [cs:gnradix], 16
 31532 00002BD1 46                      	inc	si			; Since we read "0x", march over it.
 31533 00002BD2 46                      	inc	si
 31534                                  
 31535                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 31536                                  ; GXN20--ES:SI = a digit in a number; if not, we're done
 31537                                  ;        DX:AX = current total
 31538                                  ;        BX    = 0
 31539                                  ;        CH    = 0
 31540                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 31541                                  
 31542                                  gxn20:	
 31543 00002BD3 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]	; Now DX:AX=current total, CH=0/CL=char
 31544 00002BD6 46                      	inc	si
 31545                                  
 31546 00002BD7 E891FF                  	call	toDigit		; Accepts only valid digits, A-F -> 10-16
 31547 00002BDA 720D                    	jc	short gxnQ	; <- Ah... wasn't a digit. Stop.
 31548                                  
 31549 00002BDC E80E00                  	call	mul32		; Multiply DX:AX by gnradix
 31550 00002BDF 720A                    	jc	short gxnX	; (if it's too big, error out)
 31551                                  
 31552 00002BE1 01C8                    	add	ax,cx		; Add the digit
 31553 00002BE3 11DA                    	adc	dx,bx		; (BX is 0!)--Adds 1 if last add wrapped
 31554                                  	;jc	short gxnX	; If _that_ wrapped, it's too big.
 31555                                  	;jmp	short gxn20
 31556 00002BE5 73EC                    	jnc	short gxn20
 31557                                  gxnE:	
 31558                                  	;stc			; In this case, we need to set the carry
 31559 00002BE7 EB02                    	jmp	short gxnX	; and leave--there were no digits given.
 31560                                  gxnQ:	
 31561 00002BE9 4E                      	dec	si		; Don't read in the offensive character.
 31562 00002BEA F8                      	clc			; And clear carry, so they know it's okay.
 31563                                  gxnX:	
 31564                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31565                                  	;pop	ds
 31566 00002BEB 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 31567                                  	;pop	bx
 31568 00002BEC C3                      	retn
 31569                                  
 31570                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31571                                  ;*** mul32 - multiplies the number in DX:AX by gnradix
 31572                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31573                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be multiplied, BX = 0, gnradix = multiplier
 31574                                  ; EXIT:    DX:AX has been multiplied by gnradix if carry clear; BX still 0
 31575                                  ; ERROR:   Carry set if number was too large
 31576                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 31577                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31578                                  
 31579                                  mul32:
 31580 00002BED 50                      	push	ax		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31581 00002BEE 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31582 00002BF0 2EF726[692B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=?, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31583 00002BF5 7211                    	jc	short m32E	; Too big?
 31584                                  
 31585 00002BF7 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31586 00002BF9 58                      	pop	ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 31587                                  
 31588 00002BFA 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=0, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 31589 00002BFC 2EF726[692B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=carry, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 31590 00002C01 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 31591 00002C03 01DA                    	add	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 31592 00002C05 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 31593 00002C07 C3                      	retn
 31594                                  m32E:	
 31595 00002C08 58                      	pop	ax
 31596 00002C09 C3                      	retn
 31597                                  
 31598                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31599                                  ;*** toPara - divides DX:AX by 16; result in AX only (discards extra DX data)
 31600                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31601                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be divided
 31602                                  ; EXIT:    Interpereting DX:AX as bytes, AX=paragraph equivalent, 0xFFFF max
 31603                                  ; ERROR:   None
 31604                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 31605                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31606                                  ; Note: The 386 has a 32-bit SHR, which would work perfectly for this... but we
 31607                                  ;       can't ensure a 386 host machine. Sorry.
 31608                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31609                                  
 31610                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31611                                  toPara:
 31612 00002C0A 51                      	push	cx		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:LLLL llll llll llll
 31613                                  
 31614 00002C0B B104                    	mov	cl,4		;
 31615 00002C0D D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:0000 LLLL llll llll
 31616 00002C0F 92                      	xchg	ax,dx		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh
 31617 00002C10 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31618 00002C12 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:hhhh 0000 0000 0000
 31619 00002C14 09D0                    	or	ax,dx		;    AX=hhhh LLLL llll llll
 31620                                  
 31621 00002C16 59                      	pop	cx
 31622 00002C17 C3                      	retn

 31624                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31625                                  ;*** UmbHead - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31626                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31627                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31628                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31629                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31630                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31631                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31632                                  ; Early in the boot-cycle, the pointer used to obtain this value isn't set up;
 31633                                  ; to be precise, before a UMB provider is around. In this event, the pointer
 31634                                  ; is always set to 0xFFFF; it changes once a provider is around. On most
 31635                                  ; machines (all of 'em I've seen), it changes to 0x9FFF at that point.
 31636                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31637                                  
 31638                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31639                                  UmbHead:
 31640                                  	; 13/05/2019 (because of callers, pushs & pops are not needed here)

 31643                                  	;push	ds ; ? 
 31644                                  	;push	es
 31645                                  	;push	bx ; *	
 31646                                  
 31647                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31648                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31649                                  
 31650 00002C18 B452                    	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31651 00002C1A CD21                    	int	21h
 31652                                  
 31653 00002C1C 26A18C00                	mov	ax,[es:DOS_UMB_HEAD]	; And read what's in ES:[008C]
 31654                                  	
 31655                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31656 00002C20 83F8FF                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31657 00002C23 F5                      	cmc
 31658                                  	; if AX=0FFFFh -> CF=1
 31659 00002C24 C3                      	retn

 31680                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31681                                  ;*** isSysMCB - sets ZF if ES points to an MCB owned by "SC" + (8 or 9)
 31682                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31683                                  ; ENTRY:  ES:0 should point to a valid MCB
 31684                                  ; EXIT:   ZF set if owned by SC+8 or SC+9 (for japan)
 31685                                  ; USES:   Flags
 31686                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31687                                  
 31688                                  isSysMCB:
 31689                                  	;push	ax
 31690

 31698 00002C25 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8  ; 09/04/2019

 31700                                  ism10:

 31702                                  	;cmp	ax,'SC' ; 4353h
 31703 00002C2D 26813E08005343          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'

 31708                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31709                                  
 31710                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31711                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 31712                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31713                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 31714                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 31715                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 31716                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31717                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31718                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 31719                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 31720                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 31721                                  ;      ...
 31722                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 31723                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31724                                  
 31725                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31726                                  AddrToUmb:
 31727                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31728                                  	;push	cx
 31729                                  	;push	dx
 31730 00002C35 06                      	push	es
 31731                                  
 31732 00002C36 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 31733                                  
 31734 00002C38 E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 31735 00002C3B 7222                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 31736                                  
 31737                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31738                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 31739 00002C3D 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 31740                                  
 31741                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31742                                  atu10:
 31743 00002C3F 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 22/07/2023
 31744                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31745                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 31746                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 31747                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 31748                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31749                                  
 31750                                  ;atu10:	
 31751                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 18/07/2023
 31752 00002C41 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 31753 00002C43 731D                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 31754                                  
 31755 00002C45 E8DDFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 31756 00002C48 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 31757                                  
 31758 00002C4A 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 31759                                  atu20:	
 31760                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31761                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 31762                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31763                                  	; ax = es
 31764                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31765 00002C4B 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31766 00002C50 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 31767 00002C56 7403                    	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31768                                  
 31769                                  	;NextMCB es,ax
 31770                                  
 31771                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31772                                  	;;add	ax,[es:3]
 31773                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31774 00002C58 40                      	inc	ax
 31775                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31776                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 31777 00002C59 EBE4                    	jmp	short atu10
 31778                                  
 31779                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31780                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 31781                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 31782                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31783                                  
 31784                                  atu30:	
 31785                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31786                                  	; ax = es + [es:ARENA.SIZE] 
 31787                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31788                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE] ; **
 31789 00002C5B 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 31790 00002C5D 7303                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 31791                                  atuE:	
 31792 00002C5F 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 31793 00002C61 49                      	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 31794                                  atuX:	
 31795 00002C62 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 31796                                  	
 31797 00002C64 07                      	pop	es	
 31798                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31799                                  	;pop	dx
 31800                                  	;pop	cx
 31801 00002C65 C3                      	retn
 31802                                  
 31803                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31804                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 31805                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 31806                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 31807                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 31808                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31809                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 31810                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 31811                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31812                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31813                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31814                                  
 31815                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31816                                  convUMB:
 31817 00002C66 2E833E[692B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 31818 00002C6C 7507                    	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 31819 00002C6E E8C4FF                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 31820                                  	;cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31821                                  	;jne	short cu10
 31822                                  	;inc	ax		; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 31823                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31824 00002C71 40                      	inc	ax
 31825 00002C72 7401                    	jz	short cu10	; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 31826 00002C74 48                      	dec	ax
 31827                                  cu10:	
 31828 00002C75 C3                      	retn

 32218                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32219                                  ;*** hideUMB - marks as HIDDEN all FREE elements in UMB passed as AL
 32220                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32221                                  ; ENTRY:    AL must indicate a valid UMB; 0==conv && is invalid.
 32222                                  ; EXIT:     None; free elements in UMB marked as hidden
 32223                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32224                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32225                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32226                                  
 32227                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32228                                  hideUMB:
 32229                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32230 00002CD1 52                      	push	dx ; (*)
 32231                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32232                                  	;push	ax
 32233 00002CD2 06                      	push	es
 32234                                  
 32235 00002CD3 E86800                  	call	findUMB	; (*)	; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 32236 00002CD6 7224                    	jc	short huX

 32240                                  ;            we're not in the same UMB, so exit.

 32244 00002CDB 741F                    	jz	short huX	; If it is, we've finished the UMB.
 32245                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0

 32247 00002CE3 7503                    	jnz	short hu20
 32248

 32250                                  hu20:	
 32251                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32252                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ;'Z'
 32253                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32254 00002CE8 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'Z'
 32255 00002CEE 740C                    	jz	short huX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32256

 32258 00002CF0 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 32259                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]

 32261 00002CF7 40                      	inc     ax
 32262 00002CF8 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 32263

 32265                                  huX:	
 32266 00002CFC 07                      	pop	es
 32267                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32268                                  	;pop	ax
 32269                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32270 00002CFD 5A                      	pop	dx ; (*)
 32271 00002CFE C3                      	retn
 32272

 32365                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32366                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 32367                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 32368                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32369                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32370                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 32371                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 32372                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32373                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32374                                  
 32375                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32376                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 32377                                  findUMB:
 32378                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32379                                  	;push	ax
 32380                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32381 00002D3E 51                      	push	cx ; *
 32382                                  	;push	dx
 32383                                  
 32384 00002D3F 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32385                                  
 32386 00002D41 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 32387                                  
 32388 00002D43 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32389                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32390                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32391 00002D46 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32392                                  
 32393                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32394                                  fu10:
 32395 00002D48 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 32396                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32397                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 32398                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 32399                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 32400                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32401                                  
 32402                                  ;fu10:	
 32403 00002D4A 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 32404 00002D4C 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 32405                                  
 32406 00002D4E E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32407 00002D51 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 32408                                  
 32409 00002D53 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 32410                                  fu20:	
 32411                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32412                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32413                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32414 00002D54 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 32415 00002D5A 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32416                                  
 32417                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32418                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32419                                  	; ax = es
 32420                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 32421                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32422 00002D5C 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32423 00002D61 40                      	inc	ax
 32424                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32425                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 32426 00002D62 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 32427                                  fuE:	
 32428 00002D64 F9                      	stc
 32429                                  fuX:
 32430                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32431                                  	;pop	dx
 32432                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32433 00002D65 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 32434                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 32435 00002D66 C3                      	retn
 32436                                  
 32437                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32438                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 32439                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32440                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32441                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 32442                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 32443                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32444                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32445                                  
 32446                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32447                                  BigFree:
 32448                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32449                                  	;push	bx
 32450 00002D67 51                      	push	cx
 32451                                  
 32452 00002D68 E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 32453 00002D6B 723A                    	jc	short bfX
 32454                                  
 32455 00002D6D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 32456 00002D6F 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 32457                                  
 32458                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32459                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32460                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 32461                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 32462                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32463                                  
 32464                                  bf10:	
 32465 00002D71 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 32466 00002D74 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 32467                                  
 32468                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32469 00002D76 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32470 00002D7C 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 32471                                  
 32472 00002D7E 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32473                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 32474 00002D82 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 32475                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 32476                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32477 00002D84 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 32478                                  
 32479 00002D86 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 32480                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 32481 00002D88 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32482                                  bf20:	
 32483                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32484                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 32485                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32486                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 32487 00002D8A 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32488 00002D90 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 32489                                  
 32490                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 32491 00002D92 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 32492                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32493 00002D94 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32494 00002D99 40                      	inc     ax
 32495 00002D9A 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 32496                                  
 32497 00002D9C EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 32498                                  
 32499 00002D9E 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 32500 00002DA0 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 32501 00002DA2 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32502 00002DA4 7501                    	jnz	short bfX
 32503                                  bfE:	
 32504 00002DA6 F9                      	stc				; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 32505                                  bfX:
 32506 00002DA7 59                      	pop	cx
 32507                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32508                                  	;pop	bx
 32509 00002DA8 C3                      	retn
 32510                                  
 32511                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32512                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 32513                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32514                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32515                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 32516                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32517                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32518                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32519                                  
 32520                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32521                                  
 32522                                  isSpecified:
 32523                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32524                                  	;push	ax
 32525                                  
 32526 00002DA9 30FF                    	xor	bh,bh
 32527 00002DAB 88C3                    	mov	bl,al
 32528                                  
 32529                                  	;getdata al,DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 32530                                  	;
 32531                                  	;push	ds
 32532                                  	;push	cs
 32533                                  	;pop	ds
 32534                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 32535                                  	;pop	ds
 32536                                  	
 32537                                  	;mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 32538                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32539                                  	; ds = cs
 32540 00002DAD 8A87[161F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 32541                                  
 32542 00002DB1 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 32543                                  
 32544                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32545                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32546                                  	;pop	ax
 32547                                  
 32548 00002DB3 C3                      	retn
 32549                                  
 32550                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32551                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 32552                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32553                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 32554                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 32555                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 32556                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32557                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32558                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 32559                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 32560                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 32561                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 32562                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 32563                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32564                                  
 32565                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ 20h
 32566                                  
 32567                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32568                                  
 32569                                  shrinkMCB:
 32570                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 32571                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32572                                  	;push	bx
 32573 00002DB4 51                      	push	cx
 32574 00002DB5 06                      	push	es
 32575                                  
 32576 00002DB6 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 32577                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32578                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 32579                                  
 32580 00002DB8 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32581                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32582 00002DBD 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 32583                                  
 32584 00002DBF 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32585                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32586                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 32587                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 32588                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32589                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 32590                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32591 00002DC2 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 32592 00002DC4 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 32593                                  
 32594 00002DC6 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32595                                  	
 32596                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32597                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32598 00002DCB 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32599                                  
 32600 00002DCD 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 32601 00002DD2 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 32602                                  
 32603 00002DD8 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 32604 00002DDA 40                      	inc	ax
 32605 00002DDB 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 32606                                  
 32607 00002DDD 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 32608 00002DDF 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 32609                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32610                                  	; ax > 0
 32611 00002DE1 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 32612                                  
 32613                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32614 00002DE2 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 32615                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 32616 00002DE7 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 32617                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32618                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 32619                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 32620                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 32621                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 32622                                  
 32623                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32624 00002DEB E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 32625                                  
 32626                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32627                                  	; cf=0
 32628                                  	;clc
 32629                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32630                                  	;jmp	short smX
 32631                                  smE:	
 32632                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32633                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 32634                                  	;stc
 32635                                  smX:	
 32636                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 32637 00002DEE 07                      	pop	es
 32638 00002DEF 59                      	pop	cx
 32639                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32640                                  	;pop	bx
 32641 00002DF0 C3                      	retn
 32642                                  
 32643                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32644                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 32645                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32646                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 32647                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 32648                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32649                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 32650                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32651                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 32652                                  ;
 32653                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 32654                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 32655                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 32656                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 32657                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 32658                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 32659                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 32660                                  ;       Endif
 32661                                  ;    Endif
 32662                                  ; Endif
 32663                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 32664                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 32665                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 32666                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 32667                                  ;    ENDIF
 32668                                  ; ENDIF
 32669                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32670                                  
 32671                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32672                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 32673                                  _hideUMB_:
 32674                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32675                                  	; ds = cs
 32676                                  
 32677                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32678                                  	;push	bx
 32679                                  	;push	dx
 32680 00002DF1 06                      	push	es
 32681                                  
 32682 00002DF2 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32683 00002DF4 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 32684 00002DF7 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 32685                                  
 32686 00002DF9 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 32687 00002DFB E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 32688 00002DFE 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 32689                                  
 32690 00002E00 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 32691 00002E01 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 32692 00002E03 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 32693 00002E06 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 32694                                  
 32695 00002E07 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 32696 00002E09 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 32697                                  
 32698 00002E0B 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 32699 00002E0D 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 32700                                  
 32701 00002E0F 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 32702 00002E11 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 32703 00002E14 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 32704                                  hu_10:	
 32705                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 32706                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 32707                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32708                                  ;isTiny:
 32709                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 32710                                  	;or	al,al
 32711 00002E16 800E[121F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 32712 00002E1B 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 32713                                  
 32714 00002E1D E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 32715 00002E20 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 32716                                  
 32717 00002E22 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 32718 00002E24 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.

 33225                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 33227                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 33228                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33229                                  ; USES:     Flags

 33232                                  isHideMCB:
 33233                                  	;push	ax
 33234                                  
 33235 00002F6B 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 33236 00002F71 7522                    	jne	short ihm_x			     ; then check for HIDDEN
 33237

 33239                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h

 33241 00002F7A 7519                    	jne	short ihm_x
 33242                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 33243                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 33244 00002F7C 26813E0A004444          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 33245 00002F83 7510                    	jne	short ihm_x
 33246                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 33247                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 33248 00002F85 26813E0C00454E          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 33249 00002F8C 7507                    	jne	short ihm_x
 33250                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 33251                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 33252 00002F8E 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '

 33271 00002FA8 26A30C00                	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax

 33318                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
