 33348                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33349                                  ;
 33350                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 33351                                  ;
 33352                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 33353                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 33354                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 33355                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 33356                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 33357                                  ;
 33358                                  ;	Output : none
 33359                                  ;
 33360                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 33361                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 33362                                  ;
 33363                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33364                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 33365                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 33366                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 33367                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 33368                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33369                                  
 33370                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33371                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33372                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 33373                                  InitDevLoad:
 33374                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33375                                  	;push	es ; *
 33376                                  
 33377                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33378                                  	; ds = cs
 33379 00002FD0 803E[671F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33380                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 33381                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 33382 00002FD5 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 33383                                  
 33384                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33385                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33386                                  ; %if 0
 33387                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33388 00002FD7 803E[571F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1
 33389                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33390 00002FDC 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 33391                                  
 33392                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 33393                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 33394                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 33395                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 33396                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 33397                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 33398                                  
 33399 00002FDE E85704                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 33400                                  
 33401 00002FE1 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 33402 00002FE4 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 33403 00002FE7 E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 33404 00002FEA 9C                      	pushf
 33405 00002FEB E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 33406 00002FEE 9D                      	popf
 33407                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 33408                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 33409                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 33410 00002FEF EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 33411                                  
 33412                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 33413                                  
 33414                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33415                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 33416                                  InitForConv:
 33417                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33418                                  	; ds = cs
 33419 00002FF1 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 33420                                  					;  current UMB ?
 33421 00002FF4 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 33422 00002FF6 E83F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 33423 00002FF9 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 33424                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 33425 00002FFC 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 33426                                  					;  in low memory
 33427                                  InitForHi:
 33428                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33429                                  	; ds = cs
 33430                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 33431                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 33432                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 33433 00002FFE A1[5D1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 33434 00003001 8B16[591F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33435 00003005 0316[5B1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 33436 00003009 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 33437                                  
 33438                                  InitForLo:
 33439                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33440                                  	; ds = cs
 33441                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 33442 0000300B C606[671F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33443                                  initforlo_x:
 33444                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33445                                  	; ds = cs
 33446                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 33447                                  					;  we are loading low
 33448                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = Start of Low memory
 33449                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 33450 00003010 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 33451 00003013 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 33452                                  idl1:
 33453 00003017 E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 33454                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33455                                  	; ds = cs
 33456                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 33457                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 33458                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 33459                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 33460 0000301A A3[4B1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 33461 0000301D 8916[4D1F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 33462 00003021 C706[4F1F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 33463 00003027 A3[511F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 33464                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33465                                  	;pop	es ; *
 33466 0000302A C3                      	retn
 33467                                  
 33468                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33469                                  ;
 33470                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 33471                                  ;
 33472                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 33473                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 33474                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 33475                                  ;		   current UMB
 33476                                  ;
 33477                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33478                                  
 33479                                  SpaceInUMB:
 33480                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33481                                  	; ds = cs
 33482                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 33483                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 33484                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 33485 0000302B A1[5B1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 33486 0000302E 0306[591F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 33487 00003032 2B06[5D1F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 33488                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33489                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 33490                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 33491                                  	;stc
 33492                                  	;retn
 33493                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33494 00003036 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 33495 00003039 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 33496                                  spcinumb1:
 33497 0000303B 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 33498                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33499                                  	; ds = cs
 33500 0000303C 3B06[491F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 33501                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 33502                                  spcinumb2:
 33503 00003040 C3                      	retn
 33504                                  
 33505                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33506                                  ;
 33507                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 33508                                  ;
 33509                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 33510                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 33511                                  ;
 33512                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33513                                  
 33514                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33515                                  ;
 33516                                  ;PrepareMark:
 33517                                  ;	push	ds
 33518                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 33519                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33520                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33521                                  ;	pop	ds
 33522                                  ;
 33523                                  ;	inc	ax
 33524                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33525                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33526                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33527                                  ;	retn
 33528                                  
 33529                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33530                                  ;
 33531                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 33532                                  ;
 33533                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 33534                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 33535                                  ;		 the device.
 33536                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 33537                                  ;
 33538                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 33539                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 33540                                  ;	UMB.
 33541                                  ;
 33542                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 33543                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 33544                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 33545                                  ;
 33546                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33547                                  
 33548                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33549                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 33550                                  
 33551                                  GetUMBForDev:
 33552                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33553                                  	; ds = cs
 33554 00003041 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 33555 00003044 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33556 00003047 CD21                    	int	21h
 33557                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 33558                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 33559                                  
 33560 00003049 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 33561                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 33562                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33563 0000304B 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 33564                                  
 33565 0000304D 4B                      	dec	bx
 33566                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33567                                  	; ds = cs
 33568 0000304E 391E[491F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 33569                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 33570 00003052 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 33571                                  
 33572 00003054 43                      	inc	bx
 33573                                  
 33574 00003055 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33575 00003058 CD21                    	int	21h
 33576 0000305A 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 33577                                  
 33578                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33579                                  	;dec	ax
 33580                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 33581                                  	;
 33582                                  PrepareMark:
 33583 0000305C 1E                      	push	ds
 33584 0000305D 48                      	dec	ax
 33585 0000305E 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33586 00003060 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33587 00003066 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33588 0000306C 40                      	inc	ax
 33589 0000306D 1F                      	pop	ds
 33590                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33591                                  	; ds = cs
 33592                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33593                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33594                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33595                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 33596 0000306E 891E[5B1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 33597 00003072 A3[591F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33598 00003075 A3[5D1F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33599                                  	;
 33600                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33601                                  	; cf=0
 33602                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 33603 00003078 C3                      	retn
 33604                                  
 33605                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33606                                  %if 1
 33607                                  gufd_err:
 33608 00003079 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33609                                  gufd_error:
 33610 0000307B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33611 0000307D F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 33612 0000307E EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 33613                                  %endif
 33614                                  
 33615                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33616                                  %if 0
 33617                                  gufd_err:
 33618                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33619                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33620                                  	; ds = cs
 33621                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 33622                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33623                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33624                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 33625                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33626                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33627                                  	stc
 33628                                  	retn
 33629                                  %endif
 33630                                  
 33631                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33632                                  ;
 33633                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 33634                                  ;
 33635                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 33636                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 33637                                  ;
 33638                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 33639                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 33640                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 33641                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 33642                                  ;
 33643                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 33644                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 33645                                  ;
 33646                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33647                                  
 33648                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33649                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 33650                                  
 33651                                  DevSetMark:
 33652 00003080 06                      	push	es
 33653                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33654                                  	;push	di
 33655 00003081 1E                      	push	ds
 33656 00003082 56                      	push	si
 33657 00003083 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33658 00003085 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 33659 0000308B 40                      	inc	ax
 33660 0000308C 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 33661                                  
 33662                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 33663                                  
 33664 00003090 50                      	push	ax			; save load address
 33665                                  	
 33666                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33667                                  	; ds = cs
 33668                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 33669 00003091 C536[7C03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 33670                                  
 33671 00003095 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33672 00003097 FC                      	cld
 33673                                  dsm_again:
 33674 00003098 AC                      	lodsb
 33675 00003099 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 33676 0000309B 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 33677 0000309D 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33678 0000309F EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33679                                  isit_slash:
 33680 000030A1 3C5C                    	cmp	al,'\'
 33681 000030A3 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 33682 000030A5 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33683 000030A7 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33684                                  isit_null:
 33685 000030A9 08C0                    	or	al,al
 33686 000030AB 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 33687 000030AD 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 33688                                  
 33689 000030AF BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 33690 000030B2 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 33691                                  dsm_next_char:
 33692 000030B5 AC                      	lodsb
 33693 000030B6 08C0                    	or	al,al
 33694 000030B8 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 33695 000030BA 3C2E                    	cmp	al,'.'
 33696 000030BC 7403                    	je	short blankout
 33697 000030BE AA                      	stosb
 33698 000030BF E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 33699                                  blankout:
 33700 000030C1 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 33701 000030C3 B020                    	mov	al,' '
 33702 000030C5 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 33703                                  dsm_exit:
 33704 000030C7 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load address
 33705 000030C8 5E                      	pop	si
 33706 000030C9 1F                      	pop	ds
 33707                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33708                                  	;pop	di
 33709 000030CA 07                      	pop	es
 33710 000030CB C3                      	retn
 33711                                  
 33712                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33713                                  ;
 33714                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 33715                                  ;
 33716                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 33717                                  ;
 33718                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 33719                                  ;
 33720                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 33721                                  ;	in DevSize
 33722                                  ;
 33723                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33724

 34164                                  ;
 34165                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 34166                                  ;
 34167                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 34168                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 34169                                  ;
 34170                                  ;	Returns in AX the number of paras equivalent to the
 34171                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 34172                                  ;
 34173                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 34174                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 34175                                  ;
 34176                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34177                                  
 34178                                  ; 13/05/2019
 34179                                  
 34180                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34181                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 34182                                  
 34183                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34184                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 34185                                  GetHexNum:
 34186 00003204 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 34187 00003206 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 34188                                  ghn_next:
 34189 00003208 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 34190 0000320B 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 34191 0000320E 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 34192 00003210 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 34193 00003213 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 34194 00003215 50                      	push	ax
 34195 00003216 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 34196 00003218 E8D80F                  	call	delim
 34197 0000321B 58                      	pop	ax
 34198                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34199 0000321C B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 34200 0000321F 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 34201 00003221 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 34202                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 34203                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34204 00003224 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 34205                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34206                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34207                                  ghn_shift1:
 34208 00003226 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 34209 00003228 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 34210 0000322A E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 34211 0000322C 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 34212 0000322E 46                      	inc	si
 34213 0000322F EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 34214                                  ghn_into_paras:
 34215 00003231 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 34216 00003234 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 34217 00003237 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 34218 0000323B 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 34219                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34220                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34221                                  ghn_shift2:
 34222 0000323D F8                      	clc
 34223 0000323E D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 34224 00003240 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 34225 00003242 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 34226 00003244 F8                      	clc
 34227 00003245 C3                      	retn
 34228                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34229                                  ghn_err:
 34230                                  gnib_err:
 34231 00003246 F9                      	stc
 34232                                  ghn_ret:
 34233                                  gnib_ret:
 34234 00003247 C3                      	retn

 34237                                  ;
 34238                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 34239                                  ;
 34240                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 34241                                  ;
 34242                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 34243                                  ;
 34244                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 34245                                  ;
 34246                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34247                                  
 34248                                  GetNibble:
 34249 00003248 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 34250                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34251                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34252 0000324B 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34253 0000324D 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 34254 00003250 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 34255 00003252 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 34256 00003255 C3                      	retn

 34263 0000325E 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022

 34265 00003263 C3                      	retn

 34269                                  ;	stc

 34273                                  ;============================================================================
 34274                                  
 34275                                  ; 12/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34276                                  
 34277                                  ; umb.inc (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 34278                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 34279                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data
 34280                                  
 34281                                  XMM_REQUEST_UMB	equ 10h
 34282                                  XMM_RELEASE_UMB	equ 11h
 34283                                  
 34284                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34285                                  
 34286                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34287                                  ;
 34288                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34289                                  ;
 34290                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34291                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34292                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34293                                  ;			; DS = data
 34294                                  ;
 34295                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34296                                  ;
 34297                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34298                                  ;
 34299                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34300                                  
 34301                                  umb_insert:
 34302 00003264 1E                      	push	ds
 34303                                  
 34304                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34305                                  	; ds = cs
 34306                                  
 34307                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34308 00003265 8E1E[761F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34309                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34310 00003269 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34311 0000326D 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34312 0000326F 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34313                                  ui_next:
 34314 00003271 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34315                                  					;    new block
 34316 00003273 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34317                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34318                                  					;    last
 34319 00003275 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34320 0000327B 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34321                                  					; N: get next block
 34322 0000327D 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34323                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34324 0000327F E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34325 00003282 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 34326                                  
 34327                                  ui_insert:
 34328 00003284 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 34329 00003286 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 34330                                  
 34331 00003287 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 34332 00003289 F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 34333                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 34334 0000328B C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34335                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 34336 00003290 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34337                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 34338 00003296 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 34339                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 34340 0000329A C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34341                                  
 34342                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34343                                  
 34344 000032A0 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34345 000032A2 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34346 000032A8 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 34347                                  					; mark as free
 34348 000032AF 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 34349                                  					; start & end of new block
 34350 000032B2 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 34351                                  
 34352                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 34353                                  	
 34354 000032B7 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 34355 000032B9 43                      	inc	bx
 34356 000032BA 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 34357 000032BC 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 34358                                  
 34359                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 34360                                  					; this block
 34361 000032BD 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 34362                                  	
 34363 000032BF 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34364 000032C5 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34365 000032CC 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34366 000032D0 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34367                                  
 34368 000032D7 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 34369                                  
 34370                                  ui_append:
 34371                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 34372 000032D9 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 34373 000032DE 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 34374                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 34375                                  					; block for the next arena.
 34376                                  	; 13/05/2019
 34377 000032E4 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34378                                  
 34379 000032EA 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 34380 000032EC 40                      	inc	ax
 34381 000032ED 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 34382                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 34383 000032EF F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34384                                  
 34385 000032F1 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 34386                                  
 34387 000032F3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34388 000032F9 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34389 00003300 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34390 00003304 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 34391                                  
 34392                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34393 0000330B 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34394 0000330D 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 34395 00003313 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 34396                                  					; mark as free
 34397 0000331A 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34398 0000331B 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34399                                  ui_done:
 34400                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 34401 00003320 1F                      	pop	ds
 34402                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34403                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34404                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 34405 00003321 C3                      	retn
 34406                                  
 34407                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34408                                  ;
 34409                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 34410                                  ;
 34411                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 34412                                  ;
 34413                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34414                                  
 34415                                  AllocUMB:
 34416                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34417                                  	; ds = cs
 34418 00003322 E84700                  	call	InitAllocUMB		; link in the first UMB
 34419 00003325 72FA                    	jc	short au_exit		; quit on error
 34420                                  au_next:
 34421 00003327 E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 34422 0000332A 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 34423 0000332C E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 34424 0000332F EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 34425                                  au_coalesce:
 34426                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34427                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 34428                                  ;au_exit:
 34429                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 34430                                  ;	; ds = cs
 34431                                  ;	retn
 34432                                  
 34433                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34434                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 34435                                  
 34436                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34437                                  
 34438                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34439                                  
 34440                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34441                                  ;
 34442                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34443                                  ;
 34444                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34445                                  ;	if it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34446                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34447                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34448                                  ;
 34449                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34450                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34451                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 34452                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34453                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 34454                                  ;
 34455                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34456                                  
 34457                                  umb_coalesce:
 34458                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34459                                  	; ds = cs
 34460 00003331 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 34461                                  
 34462 00003332 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 34463                                  
 34464                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34465                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34466 00003334 8E06[761F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34467 00003338 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 34468                                  uc_nextfree:
 34469 0000333D 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34470 0000333F 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34471                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34472 00003341 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 34473 00003346 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 34474                                  					; N: get next arena
 34475 00003348 E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34476 0000334B 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34477 0000334D EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 34478                                  uc_again:
 34479 0000334F E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34480 00003352 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34481                                  uc_check:
 34482 00003354 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 34483 00003359 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 34484                                  					; Y: coalesce
 34485 0000335B 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 34486 00003360 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 34487                                  	;add	[3],cx
 34488 00003361 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 34489 00003365 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 34490 00003368 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 34491 0000336A EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 34492                                  
 34493                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34494                                  ;uc_done:
 34495                                  	;retn
 34496                                  
 34497                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34498                                  ;
 34499                                  ; procedure : InitAllocUMB
 34500                                  ;
 34501                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34502                                  
 34503                                  InitAllocUMB:
 34504                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34505                                  	; ds = cs
 34506 0000336C E832D7                  	call	IsXMSLoaded
 34507 0000336F 7527                    	jnz	short iau_err		; quit on no XMS driver
 34508 00003371 B452                    	mov	ah,52h
 34509 00003373 CD21                    	int	21h			; get DOS DATA seg
 34510                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34511                                  	; ds = cs
 34512                                  	;mov	[cs:DevDOSData],es	; & save it for later
 34513 00003375 8C06[761F]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 34514 00003379 B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 34515 0000337C CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 34516                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr],bx	; get XMS driver address
 34517                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 34518 0000337E 891E[5F1F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 34519 00003382 8C06[611F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 34520                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34521 00003386 803E[751F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0 
 34522                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0 ; have we already linked a UMB?
 34523                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it
 34524                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34525 0000338B 770A                    	ja	short ia_1 ; cf=0
 34526 0000338D E83900                  	call	LinkFirstUMB		; else link the first UMB
 34527                                  	;jc	short iau_err
 34528                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34529 00003390 7207                    	jc	short iau_err2  ; cf=1
 34530                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34531                                  	; ds = cs
 34532 00003392 C606[751F]FF            	mov	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0FFh ; mark that 1st UMB linked
 34533                                  	;mov	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0FFh ; mark that 1st UMB linked
 34534                                  ia_1:
 34535                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34536                                  	; cf=0
 34537                                  	;clc
 34538 00003397 C3                      	retn
 34539                                  iau_err:
 34540 00003398 F9                      	stc
 34541                                  iau_err2:
 34542 00003399 C3                      	retn
 34543                                  
 34544                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34545                                  ;
 34546                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 34547                                  ;
 34548                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 34549                                  ;
 34550                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 34551                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 34552                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 34553                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 34554                                  ;				NC
 34555                                  ;			  else 
 34556                                  ;				CY
 34557                                  ;
 34558                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 34559                                  ;
 34560                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34561                                  
 34562                                  umb_allocate:
 34563                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34564                                  	; ds = cs
 34565 0000339A 50                      	push	ax
 34566 0000339B B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 34567 0000339D BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 34568                                  					;   possible
 34569                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34570 000033A0 FF1E[5F1F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 34571                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34572                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 34573                                  					; the largest UMB
 34574 000033A4 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 34575 000033A6 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 34576                                  	
 34577 000033A8 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 34578                                  
 34579                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34580 000033AA FF1E[5F1F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 34581                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34582                                  
 34583 000033AE 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 34584                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 34585                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34586 000033B1 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 34587                                  ua_err:
 34588 000033B3 F9                      	stc	
 34589                                  
 34590                                  	;clc
 34591                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34592                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34593                                  	; cf=0
 34594                                  	;clc 
 34595                                  ua_done:
 34596 000033B4 58                      	pop	ax
 34597 000033B5 C3                      	retn
 34598                                  	; 27/07/2023
 34599                                  ;ua_err:
 34600                                  	;stc
 34601                                  	;jmp	short ua_done
 34602                                  
 34603                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34604                                  ;
 34605                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 34606                                  ;
 34607                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 34608                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 34609                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 34610                                  ;
 34611                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34612                                  
 34613                                  	; 01/11/2022
 34614                                  get_next:
 34615 000033B6 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34616 000033BB 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 34617                                  _get_next_:
 34618 000033BD 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 34619 000033BF 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 34620 000033C3 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 34621 000033C4 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34622                                  	;clc
 34623                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34624                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34625                                  	; cf=0
 34626                                  	;clc
 34627 000033C6 C3                      	retn
 34628                                  gn_err:
 34629 000033C7 F9                      	stc
 34630                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 34631                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 34632 000033C8 C3                      	retn
 34633                                  
 34634                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34635                                  ;
 34636                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 34637                                  ;
 34638                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34639                                  
 34640                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34641                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 34642                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 34643                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34644                                  	; ds = cs
 34645 000033C9 E8CEFF                  	call	umb_allocate
 34646 000033CC 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34647                                  
 34648                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 34649                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 34650                                  
 34651                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34652                                  	; ds = cs
 34653                                  
 34654 000033CE CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 34655 000033D0 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 34656 000033D2 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 34657                                  
 34658 000033D4 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 34659 000033D6 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 34660                                  
 34661 000033D8 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34662                                  
 34663                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 34664                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34665 000033DA 49                      	dec	cx
 34666 000033DB 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 34667                                  	
 34668 000033DD 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34669 000033E3 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34670                                  					
 34671 000033EA 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34672 000033EE 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34673                                  
 34674                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 34675                                  
 34676 000033F5 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 34677 000033F7 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34678 000033FD 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 34679                                  					; mark as free 
 34680 00003404 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34681 00003405 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34682                                  
 34683                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34684                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34685 0000340A 8E06[761F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 34686                                  	; 18/09/2023
 34687 0000340E 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx
 34688                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 34689                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 34690                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 34691                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 34692                                  
 34693                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 34694                                  
 34695                                  	;mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 34696                                  	;mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 34697                                  	; 18/09/2023
 34698 00003413 268E062400              	mov	es,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34699 00003418 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 34700                                  ;scan_next
 34701                                  ; 09/12/2022
 34702                                  scannext:
 34703 0000341A 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 34704 0000341E 740C                    	je	short got_last
 34705                                  	
 34706 00003420 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34707 00003422 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34708 00003427 40                      	inc	ax
 34709 00003428 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34710                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 34711                                  	; 09/12/2022
 34712 0000342A EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 34713                                  got_last:
 34714                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 34715                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34716 0000342C 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 34717                                  
 34718 00003431 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34719                                  	;clc
 34720                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34721                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34722                                  	; cf=0
 34723                                  	;clc
 34724 00003437 C3                      	retn
 34725                                  
 34726                                  ; 11/12/2022
 34727                                  ;;lfu_err:
 34728                                  ;	;stc
 34729                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34730                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 34731                                  ;	; cf=1
 34732                                  ;	;stc
 34733                                  ;	retn
 34734                                  
 34735                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34736                                  ;
 34737                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 34738                                  ;
 34739                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 34740                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 34741                                  ;
 34742                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34743                                  
 34744                                  ShrinkUMB:
 34745                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34746                                  	; ds = cs

 34813                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34814                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34815                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34816                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34817                                  
 34818                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34819                                  ;
 34820                                  ; Summary:
 34821                                  ;
 34822                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34823                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34824                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34825                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34826                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34827                                  ;
 34828                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34829                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34830                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34831                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34832                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34833                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34834                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34835                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34836                                  ;
 34837                                  ; Example:
 34838                                  ;
 34839                                  ;   [menu]
 34840                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34841                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34842                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34843                                  ;
 34844                                  ;   [network]
 34845                                  ;   include misc
 34846                                  ;   device=foo
 34847                                  ;
 34848                                  ;   [misc]
 34849                                  ;   device=bar
 34850                                  ;   include alternate
 34851                                  ;
 34852                                  ;   [alternate]
 34853                                  ;   device=tar
 34854                                  ;
 34855                                  ;
 34856                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34857                                  ;
 34858                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34859                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34860                                  ;
 34861                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34862                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34863                                  ;   following order:
 34864                                  ;
 34865                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34866                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34867                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34868                                  ;
 34869                                  
 34870                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34871                                  
 34872                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34873                                  
 34874                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34875                                  
 34876                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34877                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34878                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34879                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34880                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34881                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34882                                  
 34883                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34884                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34885                                  
 34886                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34887                                  
 34888                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34889                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34890                                  
 34891 0000348B 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 35028                                  ;
 35029                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35030                                  ;
 35031                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35032                                  ;
 35033                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35034                                  
 35035                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35036                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35037                                  
 35038                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35039                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35040                                  parseline:
 35041                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35042                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35043                                  
 35044                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35045                                  
 35046                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35047                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35048                                  
 35049                                  nextswtch:
 35050                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35051                                  	je	short done_line
 35052                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35053                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35054                                  
 35055                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35056                                  
 35057                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35058                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35059                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 35060                                  	je	short getparm
 35061                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 35062                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35063                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35064                                  swterr:
 35065                                  	retn
 35066                                  
 35067                                  getparm:
 35068                                  	call	check_switch
 35069                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35070                                  	jc	short swterr
 35071                                  getnext:
 35072                                  	call	getchr
 35073                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35074                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35075                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35076                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 35077                                  ;swterr:
 35078                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35079                                  
 35080                                  done_line:
 35081                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35082                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 35083                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 35084                                  	jnz	short okay
 35085                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 35086                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35087                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35088                                  	retn
 35089                                  
 35090                                  okay:
 35091                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 35092                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 35093                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 35094                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 35095                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 35096                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35097                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35098                                  	; cf=0
 35099                                  	;clc
 35100                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 35101                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35102                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 35103                                  ;exitpl:
 35104                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35105                                  	; ds = cs
 35106                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35107                                  	retn
 35108                                  put_back:
 35109                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 35110                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 35111                                  	jmp	short done_line
 35112                                  
 35113                                  %endif

 35117                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 35118                                  ;
 35119                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 35120                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 35121                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 35122                                  ; error.
 35123                                  ;
 35124                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35125                                  
 35126                                  ; 09/09/2023
 35127                                  
 35128                                  err_swtch:
 35129 000034ED 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 35130                                  err_check:
 35131 000034EF F9                      	stc
 35132                                  err_chk:
 35133                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 35134 000034F0 C3                      	retn
 35135                                  
 35136                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35137

 35143 000034F8 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 35144                                  	;jb	short err_check
 35145 000034FA 72F4                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 35147 000034FE 77EF                    	ja	short err_check

 35214                                  ;
 35215                                  ; procedure : process_num
 35216                                  ;
 35217                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 35218                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 35219                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 35220                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 35221                                  ;
 35222                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35223                                  
 35224                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35225                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 35226                                  process_num:
 35227 0000353C 850E[4849]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 35228 00003540 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 35229                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35230 00003542 F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 35231                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 35232 00003545 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 35233 00003547 A2[4749]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 35234                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35235                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35236                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35237                                  	; cf=0
 35238 0000354A C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35239                                  try_f:
 35240                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35241 0000354B F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 35242                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 35243 0000354E 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 35244                                  
 35245                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 35246                                  
 35247                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 35248 00003550 A2[2048]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 35249                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35250                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35251                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35252                                  	; cf=0
 35253 00003553 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35254                                  try_t:
 35255 00003554 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 35256 00003556 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 35257                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35258 00003558 F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 35259                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 35260 0000355B 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 35261                                  
 35262                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+4],ax

 35302                                  ;

 35306                                  
 35307                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)

 35319                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35320

 35326

 35328

 35337 0000357F C3                      	retn
 35338

 35340 00003580 E86EFF                  	call	check_switch
 35341 00003583 891E[4849]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35342 00003587 72F6                    	jc	short swterr

 35344 00003589 E88C0C                  	call	getchr

 35346                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch

 35350                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35351

 35363                                  	; 03/01/2023

 35365                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 35366                                  	;retn
