 37030                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 37031                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37032                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37033                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37034                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37035                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 37036                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37037                                  
 37038                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 37039 00003CF1 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 37040 00003CF3 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 37041                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 37042 00003CF4 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 37043 00003CF7 2E893E[A014]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37044                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 37045 00003CFC F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 37046                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 37047 00003CFD F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 37048 00003CFE 07                              pop     es              ;
 37049 00003CFF 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37050 00003D00 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37051 00003D01 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37052                                  
 37053                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37054 00003D02 C3                              retn
 37055                                  
 37056                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37057                                  ;
 37058                                  ;   copy_block: copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 37059                                  ;
 37060                                  ;   INPUT
 37061                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37062                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37063                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 37064                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 37065                                  ;
 37066                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37067                                  ;       Same as above
 37068                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 37069                                  ;
 37070                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37071                                  ;       All
 37072                                  ;
 37073                                  ;   NOTES
 37074                                  ;       None
 37075                                  ;
 37076                                  ;   HISTORY
 37077                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37078                                  ;
 37079                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37080                                  
 37081                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37082                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 37083                                  
 37084                                  copy_block:
 37085 00003D03 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 37086 00003D06 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 37087 00003D08 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37088 00003D0A 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 37089 00003D0C 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 37090                                  
 37091 00003D0E 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 37092 00003D10 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 37093 00003D12 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 37094                                  
 37095                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 37096                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 37097                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 37098                                  
 37099 00003D14 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 37100 00003D19 57                              push    di              ;
 37101                                  
 37102 00003D1A BF[3047]                        mov     di,szMenu
 37103 00003D1D E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 37104 00003D20 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37105                                  
 37106 00003D22 BF[3547]                        mov     di,szCommon
 37107 00003D25 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 37108 00003D28 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37109                                  
 37110 00003D2A 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 37111 00003D2C E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 37112 00003D2F 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 37113                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37114                                  	;pop    di              ;
 37115 00003D31 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 37116 00003D33 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 37117 00003D34 51                              push    cx              ;
 37118 00003D35 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 37119 00003D37 56                              push    si              ;
 37120 00003D38 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 37121 00003D39 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 37122 00003D3B E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 37123 00003D3E E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 37124 00003D41 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37125 00003D42 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37126 00003D43 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 37127 00003D45 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37128                                  
 37129                                  copy_error:
 37130                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37131 00003D47 F8                      	clc
 37132                                  copy_skip:
 37133 00003D48 5F                              pop     di
 37134                                  ;copy_error:
 37135                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 37136                                  	;clc                    ;
 37137 00003D49 E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 37138 00003D4C EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37139                                  
 37140                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 37141                                  
 37142                                  copy_line:
 37143 00003D4E 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37144 00003D50 47                              inc     di              ;
 37145 00003D51 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 37146 00003D53 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 37147 00003D55 2E803E[A514]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 37148 00003D5B 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 37149 00003D5D E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 37150 00003D60 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 37151 00003D62 47                              inc     di              ;
 37152 00003D63 47                              inc     di              ;
 37153 00003D64 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 37154                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 37155 00003D66 E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 37156 00003D69 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 37157 00003D6B 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37158 00003D6D 47                              inc     di              ;
 37159                                  copy_next:
 37160 00003D6E 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 37161 00003D70 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 37162                                  
 37163                                  copy_nextline:
 37164 00003D72 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37165 00003D75 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 37166                                  
 37167                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37168                                  ;copy_done:
 37169                                          ;retn
 37170                                  
 37171                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37172                                  ;
 37173                                  ;   get_linenum: return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 37174                                  ;
 37175                                  ;   INPUT
 37176                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 37177                                  ;
 37178                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37179                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 37180                                  ;
 37181                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37182                                  ;       DX
 37183                                  ;
 37184                                  ;   NOTES
 37185                                  ;       None
 37186                                  ;
 37187                                  ;   HISTORY
 37188                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37189                                  ;
 37190                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37191                                  
 37192                                  get_linenum:
 37193 00003D77 50                              push    ax              ;
 37194 00003D78 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 37195 00003D7A 51                              push    cx              ;
 37196 00003D7B 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 37197 00003D7D 56                              push    si              ;
 37198 00003D7E 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37199 00003D83 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 37200                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 37201 00003D85 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 37202 00003D88 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 37203 00003D8A 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37204 00003D8B 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 37205 00003D8D 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 37206                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 37207 00003D8F 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37208 00003D90 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37209 00003D91 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37210 00003D92 C3                              retn
 37211                                  
 37212                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37213                                  ;
 37214                                  ;   srch_block: searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 37215                                  ;
 37216                                  ;   INPUT
 37217                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 37218                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 37219                                  ;
 37220                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37221                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 37222                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 37223                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 37224                                  ;
 37225                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37226                                  ;       None
 37227                                  ;
 37228                                  ;   NOTES
 37229                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 37230                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 37231                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 37232                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 37233                                  ;
 37234                                  ;   HISTORY
 37235                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37236                                  ;
 37237                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37238                                  
 37239                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 37240 00003D93 50                              push    ax              ;
 37241 00003D94 51                              push    cx              ;
 37242 00003D95 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37243 00003D9A 56                              push    si              ;
 37244 00003D9B 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37245 00003D9D 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37246 00003D9E 06                              push    es              ;
 37247 00003D9F 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37248 00003DA0 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 37249 00003DA3 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 37250 00003DA5 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 37251 00003DA7 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37252 00003DA8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37253 00003DA9 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37254 00003DAA 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37255                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 37256 00003DAB C3                              retn			;
 37257                                  
 37258                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37259                                  ;
 37260                                  ;   find_block: searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 37261                                  ;
 37262                                  ;   INPUT
 37263                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 37264                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 37265                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 37266                                  ;
 37267                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37268                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 37269                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37270                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37271                                  ;
 37272                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37273                                  ;       AX
 37274                                  ;
 37275                                  ;   NOTES
 37276                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 37277                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 37278                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 37279                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37280                                  ;
 37281                                  ;   HISTORY
 37282                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37283                                  ;
 37284                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37285                                  
 37286                                  find_block:
 37287 00003DAC E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37288 00003DAF 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 37289 00003DB1 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 37290 00003DB3 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 37291 00003DB5 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 37292 00003DB7 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 37293 00003DB9 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 37294 00003DBB 2E800E[A514]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37295 00003DC1 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 37296                                  check_line:
 37297 00003DC3 2E800E[A514]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37298 00003DC9 E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 37299 00003DCC 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 37300                                  next_line:
 37301 00003DCE E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 37302 00003DD1 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 37303                                  ;find_exit:
 37304                                  ;	retn
 37305                                  
 37306                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37307                                  ;
 37308                                  ;   comp_names: compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 37309                                  ;
 37310                                  ;   INPUT
 37311                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 37312                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37313                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37314                                  ;
 37315                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37316                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 37317                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37318                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37319                                  ;
 37320                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37321                                  ;       AX
 37322                                  ;
 37323                                  ;   NOTES
 37324                                  ;       None
 37325                                  ;
 37326                                  ;   HISTORY
 37327                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37328                                  ;
 37329                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37330                                  
 37331                                  comp_names:
 37332 00003DD3 57                              push    di              ;
 37333                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 37334 00003DD4 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 37335 00003DD7 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 37336 00003DD9 E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 37337 00003DDC 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 37338 00003DDE 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 37339 00003DE0 47                              inc     di              ;
 37340 00003DE1 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 37341                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 37342 00003DE4 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 37343 00003DE6 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 37344 00003DE8 F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 37345                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 37346 00003DE9 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37347 00003DEA C3                              retn			;
 37348                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 37349 00003DEB 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 37350 00003DED E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 37351 00003DF0 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 37352 00003DF2 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 37353                                  
 37354                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37355                                  
 37356                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37357                                  comp_names_x:
 37358                                  	;
 37359                                  comp_names_safe:
 37360 00003DF4 50                              push    ax
 37361 00003DF5 51                              push    cx
 37362 00003DF6 56                              push	si
 37363 00003DF7 1E                              push    ds
 37364 00003DF8 0E                              push    cs
 37365 00003DF9 1F                              pop     ds
 37366 00003DFA E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 37367 00003DFD 1F                              pop     ds
 37368 00003DFE 5E                      	pop	si
 37369 00003DFF 59                              pop     cx
 37370 00003E00 58                              pop     ax
 37371 00003E01 C3                              retn
 37372                                  
 37373                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37374                                  ;
 37375                                  ;   print_item: display menu item #BL
 37376                                  ;
 37377                                  ;   INPUT
 37378                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 37379                                  ;
 37380                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37381                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 37382                                  ;
 37383                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37384                                  ;       None
 37385                                  ;
 37386                                  ;   NOTES
 37387                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 37388                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 37389                                  ;
 37390                                  ;   HISTORY
 37391                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37392                                  ;
 37393                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37394                                  
 37395                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37396                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 37397                                  
 37398                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 37399 00003E02 50                              push    ax              ;
 37400 00003E03 53                              push    bx              ;
 37401 00003E04 51                              push    cx              ;
 37402 00003E05 52                              push    dx              ;
 37403 00003E06 56                              push    si              ;
 37404 00003E07 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37405 00003E09 8A3E[E746]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 37406 00003E0D CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 37407 00003E0F 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37408 00003E10 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37409 00003E12 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37410 00003E14 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 37411 00003E17 B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 37412 00003E19 CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 37413 00003E1B 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37414 00003E1D 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 37415 00003E1F 8A26[E646]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 37416 00003E23 3A1E[F046]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 37417 00003E27 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37418 00003E29 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 37419 00003E2C 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 37420 00003E2E B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 37421 00003E30 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 37422 00003E32 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 37423 00003E34 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37424 00003E36 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37425                                  print_other:                    ;
 37426 00003E39 B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 37427 00003E3B 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37428 00003E3D 8BBF[1447]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 37429 00003E41 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 37430 00003E43 8A3E[E746]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 37431 00003E47 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 37432 00003E49 B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 37433 00003E4C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37434 00003E4E FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37435 00003E50 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37436 00003E52 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37437                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 37438 00003E54 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 37439 00003E57 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 37440 00003E59 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37441 00003E5B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37442 00003E5D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37443                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 37444 00003E5F B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 37445 00003E62 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 37446 00003E64 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37447 00003E66 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37448 00003E68 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37449 00003E6A 06                              push    es              ;
 37450                                  print_loop:                     ;
 37451 00003E6B 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 37452 00003E6E 47                              inc     di              ;
 37453 00003E6F 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 37454 00003E71 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 37455 00003E73 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 37456                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 37457 00003E75 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 37458 00003E77 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 37459 00003E79 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 37460 00003E7B 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 37461 00003E7D B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 37462 00003E7F CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37463 00003E81 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37464 00003E83 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 37465 00003E86 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 37466 00003E88 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37467 00003E8A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37468 00003E8C EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 37469                                  print_done:                     ;
 37470 00003E8E 07                              pop     es              ;
 37471 00003E8F 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37472 00003E90 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37473 00003E92 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 37474 00003E94 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37475 00003E95 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37476 00003E96 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37477 00003E97 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37478 00003E98 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37479 00003E99 C3                              retn			;
 37480                                  
 37481                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37482                                  ;
 37483                                  ;   select_item: wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 37484                                  ;
 37485                                  ;   INPUT
 37486                                  ;       None
 37487                                  ;
 37488                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37489                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 37490                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 37491                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 37492                                  ;
 37493                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37494                                  ;       None
 37495                                  ;
 37496                                  ;   NOTES
 37497                                  ;       None
 37498                                  ;
 37499                                  ;   HISTORY
 37500                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37501                                  ;
 37502                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37503                                  
 37504                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 37505 00003E9A 8A1E[F046]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 37506 00003E9E 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37507 00003EA0 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 37508 00003EA3 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 37509 00003EA6 803E[F446]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37510 00003EAB 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 37511 00003EAD B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 37512 00003EAF CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37513 00003EB1 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 37514                                  check_time:
 37515 00003EB3 A0[F446]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 37516 00003EB6 2A06[F546]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 37517 00003EBA 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 37518 00003EBC 800E[EF46]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; disable all further prompting
 37519 00003EC1 C606[F546]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 37520 00003EC6 E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 37521                                  show_time:
 37522 00003EC9 53                              push    bx              ;
 37523 00003ECA 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 37524 00003ECC 8A3E[E746]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37525 00003ED0 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37526 00003ED2 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37527 00003ED4 52                              push    dx              ;
 37528 00003ED5 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 37529 00003ED8 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37530 00003EDA CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37531 00003EDC BA[AC4C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 37532 00003EDF E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 37533 00003EE2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 37534 00003EE4 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 37535 00003EE5 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 37536 00003EE7 F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 37537 00003EE9 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 37538 00003EEB 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37539 00003EED B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37540 00003EEF CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 37541 00003EF1 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 37542 00003EF3 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37543 00003EF5 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37544 00003EF7 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 37545 00003EF9 5A                              pop     dx
 37546 00003EFA B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 37547 00003EFC CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37548 00003EFE 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37549                                  input_key:
 37550 00003EFF B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 37551 00003F01 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 37552 00003F03 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37553 00003F05 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 37554 00003F07 803E[F446]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 37555 00003F0C 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 37556 00003F0E B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 37557 00003F10 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 37558 00003F12 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 37559 00003F14 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 37560 00003F16 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 37561 00003F18 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 37562 00003F1A B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 37563                                  got_time:

 37565 00003F1E 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no

 37567 00003F24 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 37568                                  got_key:

 37571 00003F2A 8706[F446]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax

 37573 00003F30 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes

 37575 00003F33 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces

 37587                                  
 37588 00003F49 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 37589 00003F4B 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 37590 00003F4D 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 37591 00003F50 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 37592 00003F52 FE0E[F046]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;

 37594 00003F59 FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item

 37599 00003F61 3A1E[F146]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?

 37601 00003F67 FE06[F046]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;

 37603 00003F6E 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 37604                                  print1: 
 37605 00003F6F 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 37606                                  print2:

 37611                                  not_down:

 37619                                  not_f8:

 37621 00003F91 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 37622                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37623                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh

 37772                                  ;
 37773                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37774                                  ;
 37775                                  ;   INPUT
 37776                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37777                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37778                                  ;
 37779                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37780                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37781                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37782                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37783                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37784                                  ;
 37785                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37786                                  ;       AX
 37787                                  ;
 37788                                  ;   NOTES
 37789                                  ;       None
 37790                                  ;
 37791                                  ;   HISTORY
 37792                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37793                                  ;
 37794                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37795                                  
 37796                                  skip_token:
 37797 00004027 E84D00                          call    get_char
 37798 0000402A 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37799 0000402C E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37800 0000402F 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37801                                  skip_check_eol:
 37802 00004031 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37803 00004033 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37804 00004035 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37805 00004037 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37806 00004039 F8                              clc
 37807                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37808 0000403A C3                      	retn
 37809                                  skip_token_eol:
 37810 0000403B F9                              stc
 37811                                  skip_token_done:
 37812 0000403C C3                              retn
 37813                                  
 37814                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37815                                  ;
 37816                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37817                                  ;
 37818                                  ;   INPUT
 37819                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37820                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37821                                  ;
 37822                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37823                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37824                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37825                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37826                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37827                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37828                                  ;
 37829                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37830                                  ;       AX
 37831                                  ;
 37832                                  ;   NOTES
 37833                                  ;       None
 37834                                  ;
 37835                                  ;   HISTORY
 37836                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37837                                  ;
 37838                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37839                                  
 37840                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37841 0000403D E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37842 00004040 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37843 00004043 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37844 00004045 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37845 00004048 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37846 0000404A EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37847                                  
 37848                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37849                                  ;
 37850                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37851                                  ;
 37852                                  ;   INPUT
 37853                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37854                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37855                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37856                                  ;
 37857                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37858                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37859                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37860                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37861                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37862                                  ;
 37863                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37864                                  ;       AX
 37865                                  ;
 37866                                  ;   NOTES
 37867                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37868                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37869                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37870                                  ;
 37871                                  ;   HISTORY
 37872                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37873                                  ;
 37874                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37875                                  
 37876                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37877                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37878                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37879                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37880                                       
 37881                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37882                                  
 37883                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37884                                  ;
 37885                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37886                                  ;
 37887                                  ;   INPUT
 37888                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37889                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37890                                  ;
 37891                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37892                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37893                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37894                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37895                                  ;
 37896                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37897                                  ;       AX
 37898                                  ;
 37899                                  ;   NOTES
 37900                                  ;       None
 37901                                  ;
 37902                                  ;   HISTORY
 37903                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37904                                  ;
 37905                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37906                                  
 37907                                  skip_line:
 37908 0000404C E82800                          call    get_char
 37909 0000404F 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37910                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)

 37913                                  skip_line_done:
 37914                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37915 00004055 C3                              retn

 37918                                  ;
 37919                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37920                                  ;
 37921                                  ;   INPUT

 37923                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37924                                  ;

 37932                                  ;       AX

 37946                                  num_loop:

 37950 0000405F 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number

 37955 00004069 52                              push    dx              ;
 37956 0000406A F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 37957 0000406C 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37958 0000406D 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 37959 0000406F 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37960 00004070 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 37961 00004072 98                              cbw                     ;
 37962 00004073 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 37963 00004075 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;

 37969                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37970                                  ;
 37971                                  ;   get_char: return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37972                                  ;
 37973                                  ;   INPUT
 37974                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37975                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37976                                  ;
 37977                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37978                                  ;       AL == next character
 37979                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37980                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37981                                  ;
 37982                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37983                                  ;       AX
 37984                                  ;
 37985                                  ;   NOTES
 37986                                  ;       None
 37987                                  ;
 37988                                  ;   HISTORY
 37989                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37990                                  ;
 37991                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37992                                  
 37993                                  get_char:
 37994 00004077 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37995 0000407A 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37996                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37997 0000407C 26                      	es	
 37998 0000407D AC                      	lodsb
 37999 0000407E 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 38000 00004080 C3                              retn			;
 38001                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 38002 00004081 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 38003                                  nearby_ret:
 38004 00004084 C3                              retn

 38006                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38007                                  ;
 38008                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 38009                                  ;
 38010                                  ;   INPUT
 38011                                  ;       AL == current command code
 38012                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 38013                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 38014                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 38015                                  ;
 38016                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38017                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 38018                                  ;
 38019                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38020                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 38021                                  ;
 38022                                  ;   NOTES
 38023                                  ;       None
 38024                                  ;
 38025                                  ;   HISTORY
 38026                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38027                                  ;
 38028                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38029                                  
 38030                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38031                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 38032                                  
 38033                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38034                                  query_user:
 38035 00004085 F606[EF46]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 38036                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38037 0000408A 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 38038 0000408C E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 38039                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38040                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 38041                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 38042                                  qu_1:
 38043 0000408F F606[EF46]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 38044 00004094 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 38045 00004096 50                              push    ax                      ;
 38046 00004097 A0[A414]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 38047 0000409A F606[EF46]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 38048 0000409F 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 38049 000040A1 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 38050                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38051 000040A3 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 38052                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38053                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 38054                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 38055                                  
 38056                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38057 000040A5 58                      	pop	ax
 38058 000040A6 C3                      	retn
 38059                                  
 38060                                  query_all:
 38061                                  
 38062                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 38063                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 38064                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 38065                                  
 38066 000040A7 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38067 000040A8 BA[FE4C]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 38068 000040AB 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 38069 000040AD 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 38070                                  
 38071 000040AF 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 38072 000040B1 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 38073 000040B3 BF[3C47]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 38074                                  find_match:                             ;
 38075 000040B6 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 38076 000040B8 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 38077 000040BA 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 38078 000040BC 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38079 000040BD 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 38080 000040BF 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 38081 000040C1 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 38082                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 38083 000040C4 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 38084                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 38085 000040C6 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 38086 000040C9 B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 38087 000040CB B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38088                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 38089 000040CD 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 38090 000040CF 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38091 000040D0 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38092 000040D2 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38093 000040D4 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 38094 000040D6 B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 38095 000040D8 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 38096 000040DB 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 38097 000040DD B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 38098                                  cmd_notset:
 38099 000040DF CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 38100                                  line_print:                             ;
 38101                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 38102 000040E1 26                              es
 38103 000040E2 AC                      	lodsb
 38104 000040E3 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 38105 000040E5 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 38106 000040E7 B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 38107                                  non_null:                               ;
 38108 000040E9 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 38109 000040EB 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 38110 000040ED 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 38111                                          ; 10/09/2023
 38112 000040EF 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 38113                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 38114 000040F2 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 38115                                  non_space:                              ;
 38116 000040F4 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38117 000040F6 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 38118 000040F8 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38119 000040FA EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 38120                                  
 38121                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 38122 000040FC BA[9C4C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 38123                                  
 38124                                  generic_prompt:
 38125 000040FF E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 38126                                  input_loop:                             ;
 38127 00004102 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 38128 00004104 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 38129 00004106 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 38130 00004108 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 38131 0000410A 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 38132 0000410D 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 38133 0000410F A0[A84C]                        mov     al,[_$NO] 		;
 38134 00004112 800E[EF46]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 38135 00004117 EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 38136                                  not_func:
 38137 00004119 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 38138 0000411B 3A06[A84C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 38139 0000411F 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 38140 00004121 3A06[A44C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 38141 00004125 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 38142 00004127 803E[A414]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 38143 0000412C 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 38144 0000412E 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 38145 00004130 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 38146 00004132 800E[EF46]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 38147 00004137 A0[A44C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 38148                                  legal_char:                             ;
 38149 0000413A E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 38150 0000413D 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38151                                  
 38152 0000413E 3A06[A84C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 38153 00004142 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 38154                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38155 00004144 F8                      	clc
 38156                                  do_cmd:
 38157 00004145 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38158                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38159                                  	; cf=0
 38160                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 38161 00004146 C3                      	retn
 38162                                  
 38163                                  skip_cmd:
 38164 00004147 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38165                                  skip_all:
 38166 00004148 B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 38167 0000414A F9                      	stc
 38168 0000414B C3                      	retn

 38224                                  
 38225                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38226                                  
 38227                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38228                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38229                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38230                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38231                                  
 38232                                  disable_autoexec:
 38233                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38234                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38235                                  
 38236 00004180 F606[EF46]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 38237 00004185 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 38238 00004187 F606[E546]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 38239 0000418C 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 38240 0000418E 800E[E546]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 38241                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 38242 00004193 810E[EF46]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 38243 00004199 BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38244                                  dae_1:
 38245                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38246 0000419C A0[2446]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 38247                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 38248 0000419F 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 38249 000041A1 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 38250 000041A3 8A1E[2546]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 38251 000041A7 B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 38252 000041A9 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 38253 000041AB 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 38254 000041AE 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 38255 000041B1 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 38256 000041B3 881E[2546]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 38257 000041B7 81C3[2646]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 38258 000041BB 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 38259                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 38260 000041BC 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 38261 000041BF 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 38262 000041C1 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 38263 000041C2 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 38264 000041C4 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 38265                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 38266 000041C7 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 38267                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 38268                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 38269 000041CA C3                              retn
 38270

 38415

 38424 00004233 1F                      	pop	ds

 38426                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38427                                  
 38428                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38429                                  
 38430                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38431 00004234 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 38432                                  ;else

 38434                                  ;endif

 38436                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38437                                  	;xor	si, si

 38439                                  convloop:
 38440 00004236 AC                      	lodsb
 38441 00004237 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 38442 00004239 7209                    	jb	short noconv

 38444 0000423D 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 38445 0000423F 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 38446 00004241 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 38447                                  noconv:
 38448                                  
 38449                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38450                                  
 38451                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38452                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38453                                  
 38454                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 38455                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 38456                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 38457                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 38458                                  ;
 38459 00004244 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 38460 00004247 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 38461 00004249 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 38462 0000424B 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 38463                                  check_eol:

 38465 0000424F 7406                    	je	short convdone

 38467 00004253 7402                    	je	short convdone
 38468                                  ;endif

 38473 00004258 5E                      	pop	si
 38474 00004259 59                      	pop	cx
 38475 0000425A C3                      	retn
