 38562                                  
 38563 000042AF 2EFF36[4F1F]            	push	word [cs:DevEntry]
 38564 000042B4 2EA3[4F1F]              	mov	[cs:DevEntry],ax
 38565 000042B8 BB[6A03]                	mov	bx,packet
 38566 000042BB 2EFF1E[4F1F]            	call	far [cs:DevEntry]
 38567 000042C0 2E8F06[4F1F]            	pop	word [cs:DevEntry]
 38568 000042C5 C3                      	retn
 38569                                  
 38570                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38571                                  ;
 38572                                  ; procedure : todigit
 38573                                  ;
 38574                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38575                                  
 38576                                  todigit:
 38577 000042C6 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 38578                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 38579                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38580 000042C8 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 38581                                  	;cmp	al,9
 38582                                  	;ja	short notdig
 38583                                  	;clc
 38584                                  	;retn
 38585                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38586 000042CA 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 38587 000042CC F5                      	cmc
 38588                                  notdig:
 38589                                  	;stc
 38590                                  notdig2:
 38591 000042CD C3                      	retn
 38592                                  
 38593                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38594                                  ;
 38595                                  ; procedure : getnum
 38596                                  ;
 38597                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 38598                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 38599                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 38600                                  ;
 38601                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38602                                  
 38603                                  getnum:
 38604 000042CE 53                      	push	bx
 38605 000042CF 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 38606                                  b2:
 38607 000042D1 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 38608 000042D4 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 38609                                  
 38610 000042D6 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 38611 000042D7 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 38612                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 38613                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38614 000042D8 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 38615 000042DA F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 38616 000042DC 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 38617 000042DD 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 38618 000042DF 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 38619 000042E2 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 38620                                  
 38621 000042E4 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 38622                                  
 38623 000042E5 E830FF                  	call	getchr			; get next digit
 38624 000042E8 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 38625 000042EA 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 38626 000042EC 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 38627 000042EE 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 38628 000042F0 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 38629 000042F2 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 38630 000042F4 7417                    	je	short b15
 38631 000042F6 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 38632 000042FB 7410                    	je	short b15
 38633 000042FD 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 38634                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38635                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38636                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 38637                                  	;nop
 38638 000042FF 740C                    	je	short b15
 38639 00004301 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 38640 00004303 7408                    	je	short b15
 38641 00004305 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 38642 00004307 7404                    	je	short b15
 38643 00004309 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 38644 0000430B 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 38645                                  b15:
 38646 0000430D 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 38647 00004312 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 38648                                  b1:
 38649 00004317 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 38650 00004319 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 38651 0000431B 5B                      	pop	bx
 38652 0000431C C3                      	retn
 38653                                  badnum:
 38654                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38655                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 38656 0000431D 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 38657                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 38658 0000431F 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 38659 00004323 5B                      	pop	bx
 38660 00004324 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 38661 00004325 C3                      	retn
 38662                                  
 38663                                  ;****************************************************************************
 38664                                  
 38665                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 38666                                  
 38667                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38668                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 38669                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 38670                                  ;	si = 0
 38671                                  ;	ax = country id
 38672                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 38673                                  ;	bx = file handle
 38674                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 38675                                  ;
 38676                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 38677                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 38678                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 38679                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 38680                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38681                                  
 38682                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38683                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 38684                                  
 38685                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38686                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)
 38687                                  
 38688 00004326 57                      	push	di
 38689 00004327 50                      	push	ax
 38690 00004328 52                      	push	dx
 38691                                  
 38692 00004329 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38693 0000432B 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 38694 0000432D B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 38695 00004330 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 38696 00004333 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38697                                  
 38698 00004335 06                      	push	es
 38699 00004336 56                      	push	si
 38700                                  
 38701 00004337 0E                      	push	cs
 38702 00004338 07                      	pop	es
 38703                                  
 38704 00004339 BF[8A45]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 38705 0000433C B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 38706 0000433F F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 38707                                  
 38708 00004341 5E                      	pop	si
 38709 00004342 07                      	pop	es
 38710 00004343 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 38711                                  
 38712 00004345 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 38713 00004348 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 38714 0000434B 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 38715                                  
 38716 0000434D 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 38717 0000434E 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 38718 00004350 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 38719 00004353 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 38720 00004356 E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 38721 00004359 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38722                                  
 38723 0000435B 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 38724 0000435D 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 38725 00004361 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38726                                  
 38727 00004363 46                      	inc	si
 38728 00004364 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 38729 00004365 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 38730 00004366 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 38731 00004367 5F                      	pop	di
 38732                                  
 38733                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 38734 00004368 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 38735 0000436B 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 38736                                  
 38737                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 38738                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 38739                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38740 0000436D 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 38741 0000436F 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 38742 00004371 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 38743 00004374 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 38744                                  
 38745                                  setdoscntry_next:
 38746 00004376 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 38747 00004378 46                      	inc	si
 38748 00004379 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 38749 0000437A E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 38750                                  
 38751                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 38752                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38753 0000437C 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 38754                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 38755 0000437D F9                      	stc
 38756 0000437E C3                      	retn
 38757                                  
 38758                                  setdosdata_fail:
 38759 0000437F 5E                      	pop	si
 38760 00004380 59                      	pop	cx
 38761 00004381 5F                      	pop	di
 38762 00004382 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 38763                                  
 38764                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 38765 00004384 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 38766                                  
 38767                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 38768 00004387 2E8916[9245]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 38769 0000438C 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 38770 0000438F 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 38771 00004392 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 38772 00004395 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 38773 00004398 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 38774                                  
 38775 0000439A 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 38776 0000439C 46                      	inc	si
 38777 0000439D 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 38778                                  
 38779                                  setdoscntry_data:
 38780 0000439E 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38781 0000439F 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 38782 000043A0 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 38783

 38787                                  
 38788 000043A9 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 38789 000043AC 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 38790 000043AF B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38791 000043B2 F9                      	stc
 38792 000043B3 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38793 000043B5 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38794                                  
 38795 000043B7 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 38796 000043BA B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 38797 000043BD B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 38798 000043BF F9                      	stc
 38799 000043C0 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 38800 000043C2 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 38801                                  
 38802 000043C4 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38803 000043C6 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 38804                                  
 38805 000043C8 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 38806 000043CB 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 38807 000043CE B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38808 000043D1 F9                      	stc
 38809 000043D2 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 38810 000043D4 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38811                                  
 38812 000043D6 56                      	push	si
 38813 000043D7 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 38814 000043DA 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 38815 000043DC 5E                      	pop	si
 38816 000043DD BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 38817 000043E0 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 38818 000043E3 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 38819 000043E5 F9                      	stc
 38820 000043E6 CD21                    	int	21h
 38821 000043E8 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38822                                  
 38823 000043EA 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38824 000043EC 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 38825                                  
 38826 000043EE 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 38827 000043F1 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 38828 000043F4 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 38829 000043F6 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 38830 000043F7 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 38831 000043F8 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 38832 000043FC 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38833                                  
 38834                                  	;if	bugfix
 38835 000043FE E83100                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 38836                                  	;endif
 38837                                  
 38838 00004401 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 38839 00004403 7511                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 38840                                  
 38841 00004405 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 38842                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 38843 00004409 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 38844                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 38845

 38847                                  
 38848                                  	;push	ax

 38850                                  	;mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 38851                                  	;pop	ax

 38855

 38863                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 38864 00004421 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 38865                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 38866                                  
 38867                                  setdoscntry_data_next:
 38868 00004425 5E                      	pop	si			;restore control buffer pointer
 38869 00004426 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left

 38871 00004428 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 38872 0000442A 46                      	inc	si
 38873 0000442B 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 38874 0000442C 49                      	dec	cx
 38875                                  	; 10/09/2023

 38877                                  	;cmp	cx,0
 38878                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_ok
 38879 0000442F E96CFF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data
 38880                                  
 38881                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38882                                  ;setdoscntry_ok:
 38883                                  	;retn

 38927                                  
 38928                                  getcountrydestination:
 38929                                  
 38930                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38931                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 38932                                  ;
 38933                                  ;input: al - data id
 38934                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38935                                  ;on return:
 38936                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 38937                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 38938                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38939                                  
 38940                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38941                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 38942                                  
 38943                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38944                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 38945                                  
 38946 0000444B 51                      	push	cx
 38947                                  	;add	di,74
 38948 0000444C 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 38949                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 38950 0000444F 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 38951 00004452 47                      	inc	di
 38952 00004453 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 38953                                  
 38954                                  getcntrydest:
 38955 00004454 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 38956 00004457 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 38957                                  
 38958 00004459 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 38959 0000445D 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 38960                                  
 38961 0000445F 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 38962 00004462 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 38963                                  
 38964                                  getcntrydest_1:
 38965                                  	;add	di,41
 38966 00004464 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 38967                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 38968 00004467 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 38969 00004469 F9                      	stc
 38970                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38971                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 38972                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38973 0000446A 59                      	pop	cx
 38974 0000446B C3                      	retn
 38975                                  
 38976                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 38977                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38978 0000446C 47                      	inc	di
 38979                                  
 38980                                  ;	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 38981                                  ;	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 38982                                  ;
 38983                                  ;	;inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 38984                                  ;	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38985                                  
 38986                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38987 0000446D 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 38988 0000446F 74F9                    	je	short getcntrydest_exit
 38989                                  
 38990                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 38991                                  	;les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 38992                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38993 00004471 26C43D                  	les	di,[es:di]
 38994                                  ;getcntrydest_exit:
 38995 00004474 59                      	pop	cx
 38996 00004475 C3                      	retn
 38997                                  
 38998                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38999                                  
 39000                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 39001                                  
 39002                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39003                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 39004                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 39005                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 39006                                  ;
 39007                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 39008                                  ;	 be moved.
 39009                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 39010                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 39011                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 39012                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 39013                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 39014                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 39015                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39016                                  
 39017 00004476 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 39018 00004477 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 39019 0000447A F9                      	stc
 39020 0000447B CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 39021 0000447D 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 39022 0000447E 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 39023                                  
 39024 00004480 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 39025 00004482 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 39026 00004484 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 39027 00004486 F9                      	stc
 39028 00004487 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 39029                                  ricb_exit:
 39030 00004489 C3                      	retn
 39031                                  
 39032                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39033                                  
 39034                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 39035                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 39036                                  %if 0
 39037                                  
 39038                                  set_country_path:
 39039                                  
 39040                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39041                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 39042                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 39043                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 39044                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 39045                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 39046                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 39047                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39048                                  
 39049                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39050                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 39051                                  
 39052                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39053                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 39054                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 39055                                  
 39056                                  	push	si
 39057                                  
 39058                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39059                                  	push	es
 39060                                  	pop	ds
 39061                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 39062                                  
 39063                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 39064                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 39065                                  
 39066                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39067                                  	inc	si
 39068                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 39069                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 39070                                  
 39071                                  scp_default_drv:
 39072                                  	mov	ah,19h
 39073                                  	int	21h
 39074                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 39075                                  
 39076                                  scp_setdrv:
 39077                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 39078                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 39079                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39080                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 39081                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 39082                                  
 39083                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 39084                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 39085                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 39086                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39087                                  	jne	short scp_path
 39088                                  
 39089                                  scp_root_dir:
 39090                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 39091                                  scp_path:
 39092                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 39093                                  
 39094                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 39095                                  scpath_exit:
 39096                                  
 39097                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39098                                  	push	es
 39099                                  	pop	ds
 39100                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 39101                                  
 39102                                  	pop	si
 39103                                  	retn
 39104                                  
 39105                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39106                                  
 39107                                  chk_drive_letter:
 39108                                  
 39109                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 39110                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 39111                                  ;carry set if not.
 39112                                  
 39113                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 39114                                  
 39115                                  	push	ax
 39116                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 39117                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 39118                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 39119                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 39120                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 39121                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 39122                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 39123                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 39124                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39125                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 39126                                  
 39127                                  cdletter_no:
 39128                                  	stc
 39129                                  cdletter_exit:
 39130                                  	pop	ax
 39131                                  	retn
 39132                                  
 39133                                  %endif
 39134                                  
 39135                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39136                                  
 39137                                  move_asciiz:
 39138                                  
 39139                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 39140                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 39141                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 39142                                  
 39143                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39144                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)
 39145                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:5187h)
 39146                                  
 39147                                  masciiz_loop:
 39148                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39149 0000448A F604FF                  	test	byte [si],0FFh
 39150 0000448D A4                      	movsb
 39151                                  	;cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 39152                                  	;jne	short masciiz_loop
 39153 0000448E 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023
 39154 00004490 C3                      	retn
 39155                                  
 39156                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39157                                  
 39158                                  ;	ds:dx points to string to output (asciz)
 39159                                  ;
 39160                                  ;	prints <badld_pre> <string> <badld_post>
 39161                                  
 39162                                  badfil:
 39163 00004491 0E                      	push	cs
 39164 00004492 07                      	pop	es
 39165                                  
 39166 00004493 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 39167                                  badload:
 39168 00004495 BA[4D4A]                	mov	dx,badld_pre	; want to print config error
 39169 00004498 BB[0A4A]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 39170                                  prnerr:
 39171 0000449B 0E                      	push	cs
 39172 0000449C 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 39173 0000449D E81D00                  	call	print
 39174                                  prn1:
 39175 000044A0 268A14                  	mov	dl,[es:si]
 39176 000044A3 08D2                    	or	dl,dl
 39177 000044A5 7407                    	jz	short prn2
 39178 000044A7 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2 
 39179 000044A9 CD21                    	int	21h
 39180 000044AB 46                      	inc	si
 39181 000044AC EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 39182                                  prn2:
 39183 000044AE 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 39184 000044B0 E80A00                  	call	print
 39185                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39186                                  	; ds = cs ; *

 39188                                  				; suppress line number when handling command.com
 39189                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:donotshownum],1 
 39190 000044B8 7407                    	je	short prnexit
 39191                                  	
 39192                                  	; 18/12/2022
 39193                                  	;call	error_line
 39194 000044BA E966E4                  	jmp	error_line
 39195                                  ;prnexit:
 39196                                  	;retn
 39197

 39199                                  
 39200                                  print:
 39201 000044BD B409                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_STRING_OUTPUT ; 9
 39202 000044BF CD21                    	int	21h
 39203                                  prnexit:	; 18/12/2022
 39204 000044C1 C3                      	retn
